Ok so now I'm too excited. I just received my clutch today. First of all let me say it came well packaged and wrap as to not cause any damage to the clutch. It is wallet size and mine is 71/2" x 31/2". They come in an assortment of colors. I chose the pink. It has a nice clasp that I found a little challenging to unsnap. So if you have a problem with arthritis are such, you may find it a bit challenging.
Once in snapped, you will find two sections to your coins are like. The lining has a nicely designed cloth lining that's stitched together and attached to a silver plated attachment that is folds up very nicely to its per folded leather side lining.

The other fold over section of the wallet has this stylish silver decorative piece on the front that really seines the wallet. It gives it a sense of eloquence that blend perfectly with the leather. It opens up to a six section card holder with a area behind the card storage to discreetly tuck away bills or papers. Next it open up to another tri- compartment sectional area that also has a zipper area. Just tons and tons of storage.
Additionally there is another section on the inner side of the button snap. The button snap closes up the wallet into a nice clutch.

This is a very eye pleasing clutch/wallet that you will be delighted to pull out of your purse or to carry as a clutch by itself.  I received this product in exchange for my more than fair and honest review of it.

Well let me start off by saying that I am a little older than most of you ladies that have bought this.  I know that there are age appropriate clothing rules, but hey if you can rock it, do it! I however, would not wear this as is, I plan on wearing this under something.  This is a glorified body stocking.  It is definitely see through and you do need some unmentionables underneath unless you plan to wear it on the pole. It does stretch.  The fabric is nylon polyester blend even though it looks like netted fabric you will sweat. There were no labels cause it would show anyway I bought a medium and I will have to hem the legs. I'm 5 4" and between130-150lbs.  So I tried it on with a wool pair of stockings and micro fiber long johns. I'm pair shaped. I bought it for the pattern and the wow factor.  This leaves nothing to the imagination. I'm too modest the wear it without a cover up of some kind (don't want that kind of attention).  Y'all go on with your bad selves, you look fabulous.
summary: Know Who You Are to Wear This

When I came to purchase this swim suit initially there was only 1 review and it said that the suit ran about 2 sizes too small (she'd mentioned that the 6T fit like a 4T). So I ordered a 4T for my daughter who will be 2 in one week. Upon receipt of the suit, I found that it actually fits very true to size (so, much too large for my daughter). I have a son who is a 4T and it looks like the perfect size for him.
The swimming cap does fit my daughter perfectly now, so Id say those run quite small. It wouldnt come close to fitting my sons big head. But we probably won't really use the swimming cap. Its just a cute accessory to have.
The suit is well sewn (no loose threads, etc) and the material is great. Honestly, its much higher quality than I expected it to be. I love the design, with the cute cut out in the back. And the leopard print is adorable.
I didn't notice before purchasing, however, that it is bedazzled on the front (you can slightly see this in the 4th photo on the listing). It says Beach Baby and has a butterfly in little rhinestones. I think it would be WAY cuter without this, especially since mine is just slightly off center which annoys me.
The rhinestones aren't super noticeable, but I would have gone with another suit if Id seen them initially. But Im still excited to hang on to this suit until it fits. Im sure my daughter will get plenty of use from it.
I did receive this product for free or at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I hope that my review has helped you in your decision to purchase this product.

Review for Girl One-Piece leopard Flower Swimwear Bathing Suit Bikini Swimsuit

I was excited to see this swimsuit for sale. It looked super cute and I just knew my 3 year old would love it. She did love it. I did not. There were several issues I found with this suit. I bought a size 3t which is the size she wears. When she put on the suit the straps were so long that the top of the front of the suit fell to about an inch and a half below my daughters nipples. Luckily my mom is good with a sewing machine. She shortened the straps not once, but twice. After the second shortening the suit finally covered my daughters nipples but then my daughter complained of the suit being "too tight." I just don't think this suit is made with the right proportions. The hat was also cute but fit super snug almost like a swim cap but with long strands to tie under the chin. My three year old was less than impressed. Also, you cannot see in the picture but there are silver decals on the front of this suit that say "beach baby." Not appropriate for a three year old either.

I received this suit at a reduced price in exchange for my honest review.

The bathing suit is very cute with its leopard print and pink trim, a truly girly suit. The front offers all the modesty and coverage you would want with a child this young, and the back is very open but not in any awkward places. The cap is a bit small, as it should be to fit as a swim cap. It is made of the same material as the suit, and the only issue I had was that thee pink trim around the base of the cap is not a stretchy as the leopard material, which made it a bit hard for me to be able to put on my daughters head, but we managed just fine. reviewText:
So adorable! My little girl didn't even let me finish getting it out of the package before she wanted to try it on.

Likes

Dislikes

As I said, my daughter barely let me get it out of the package (which is why she's still wearing pants in the photos - that, and it was 60 degrees!. She loved the pink color and ruffles. She put the hat on right away and I was surprised to see it was the swimsuit material and fit more like a swim cap. I wish it were a bucket hat to provide some sun protection. The ruffle does nothing to help since it's so tight to her head, and the strings are pretty unnecessary. My daughter is 3y6mo and typically wears about a 4t and is getting into 5t, so I went bigger. It fit well in the suit but the straps were definitely loose and the top sags.

The suit seems well-made and would fit great if it were a smaller size. The suit actually fit her well, but the straps were pretty loose. My favorite part was the back! The back has a cute cutout in the center, this also is One solid piece, no ties to worry about! One thing I'm not a huge fan of is the rhinestone wording across the chest part of the suit, it is very hard to read against the leopard print background. The little hat that comes with this is adorable, but it is small, it is made of the same materials as the swimsuit, and has a little pink ruffle around it, as well as a tie below th in strap. Overall this is a cute fun suit! I recieved this product at a discounted price in return for my honest review.
summary: I purchased this in a size 2t for my one year old who typically wears a size 12-18 months sized clothing and it fits very nicely

reviewText:
This is a super cute absolutely adorable swimsuit. I got for my niece. She loved it so much she didn't want to take it off . It is made well and the stitching is nice and tight. This is so pretty making my little lady look like a princess. It fits as described with the sizing and I was happy I got it a size big so she can keep it for a bit longer then just this summer. The color is very nice and the outfit looks lovely on. She is very comfortable in it and it doesn't have any tags or snaps to bother her little sensitive skin. The hat fits nice and has a nice stretch in the material so it isn't to tight for her head it fits comfortably. It is really well put together which is great for all the wear and tear she is giving it. I am very pleased with this outfit it is simply adorable for my niece.

This is an adorable little purse -- very well made, and the perfect size for what I used it for:  a safe way to carry a mini mp3 player, charger, and earbuds.  Having two separate compartments keeps the wires from getting tangled up together, and the way the product flares at the bottom means there's more room inside than in many of the comparable products I looked at.  The color is as pictured -- vibrant and pretty, and easy to find in the depths of my large handbag.  If I could take off half a star, I would, because a little slip of paper fell out of the outer pocket that named a "Suggested Retail Price" of $12.00.  I paid $17.89 for it on Amazon, so I felt as though I'd overpaid by a lot.  Still, that's not the fault of the product, which is why I'm keeping my review at 5 stars.
summary: This is an adorable little purse -- very well made

This is an adorable necklace. The sterling finish gives it a whiter and glossier look, whereas the platinum is more subdued. The chain is the perfect length. I usually prefer an 18 inch chain, so I was happy with the length, and the fact that it could be adjusted if I wanted to wear it like a choker.

I wore this with a summer dress out to dinner, and I have already received tons of complements. It looks much more expensive than it is, so the price is right. The pendant is also a good size. I have purchased some anchor necklaces before for my cruises, and the pendant was oversized, and the chain was long. Not the look I was going for.  This size was as described in the pictured, almost the size of a nickel. The front of the pendant is raised, whereas as the back is flat. Since no one is seeing the back of the necklace, I have no issues with that. In fact, it helps the pendant lay flat
instead of twisting and turning, and sometimes tangling like other pendants. Overall, I am pleased with this necklace.

The item title says "Italy Made," which insinuates that the product is made in Italy.  It is not.  It is made in China.  I guess what's "Italy Made" is the leather, not the wallet itself. This is not just misleading, it's outright deceptive.  It irks me when we are not given the correct information to make purchasing decisions.

All of that aside, I don't like the design of the wallet.  American bills barely fit in the bill pocket, while the credit card slots are too loose.  Also, the credit card pockets are not stitched to the edge, which means that a bulky point forms in the middle of the wallet where all the cards pile together when the wallet is folded.  I guess this is how they make the wallet "slim," by getting that bulk farther away from where it folds, but I don't see the leather wearing nicely given this construction.

reviewText:
Size up 2-3 sizes! I usually wear a small, and the large hugs my body. The material is so soft and drapey, I think an extra large would be flattering too. I'm super skinny, and the outfit fits me really well. If you have an average sized chest, you probably need to size up more. The material is very soft and stretchy, but cut for a slim build. I haven't washed it yet, but it seems like it may shrink if dried.

I'm happy with what I received. The short sleeved black set includes:
- a cap-sleeve length t-shirt that is short enough to let the pant waistband barely peek out
- a soft (for fashion or layering, not for support) halter sportsbra-like piece
- long pants with a contrasting waistband and knot detail at the side (see pic). I especially like these pants, the leg hole isn't tight like leggings, but they aren't flared or wide either. I'm 5'4 and they are the perfect length.

My set looks and fits exactly as pictured. A perfectly comfortable outfit for a slim build.
summary: Great for slim builds, but size up 2-3 sizes!

What a beautiful neckless!!!!!!! I purchased my YFN Sterling Silver "You Are My Sunshine",neckless for my daughter who just graduated High School ; it would be a  special gift for her to have from me before she heads off to college. This would be perfect for yoga or pilates; however, I'd need more support for a high impact workout!

reviewText:
This outfit did run a little smaller, but the overall fit was comfortable just a little snug on the bust. The material was lightweight and breathable, stretchy and the double bra top was great for coverage and comfort during a workout. I liked the gray banding at the top of the pants because sometime that is a problem area that I don't like to draw attention to, and they did that very well, plus I didn't worry about them sliding down my waist and bunching up.
If you buy this product I would encourage you to go a size up and don't rely on the stretchy material to give you that much extra space, just because you want to outfit to fit well and be able to keep the moisture off your skin when you are sweating in a workout and pulled too tight against the skin.
I wash my workout outfit in cold water and would hang to dry, that way you aren't stretching the material out of losing the elasticity of the material.
I like the top, because it gives great support and has the removable padding for those that don't want it, I feel like the coverage the top gives would allow you to work out in just this outfit and feel comfortable even if your like me and don't have that toned body.

I'll start by advising to DEFINITELY order up a size like the instructions say. I'm typically a size 2 petite bottoms and XS tops in women's, or 3 in bottoms and small tops in juniors, and the size medium/large fits perfectly. I was really hesitant because I've basically never worn anything above a small, but I'm glad I ordered up a size.
The material is super stretchy. I'm not sure of the material but it seems very spandexy. There are no tags which is nice, but it was tough to tell front from back on the pants. I'm not sure there is a "right" way, but when I first put them on the seam felt a bit odd. I turned them around and they felt way better.
A common worry I have with this style pants is them stretching to be see-through on the hiney. These actually are NOT see-through at all, so I love them!
I'm also very short (5'0") but the length is good! Right at the ankle, not too long, not too short.
The bra is a little strange feeling to get used to, but once you have it in the right place, it's fairly comfy! Also fits perfectly.
I have to give these a five star rating because they are a perfect fit and even better than I expected! Great set.

reviewText: I was concerned about this not fitting around my waist I'm a size 14/16 it feel well around the waist. However even with it down on my hips it doesn't even nearly touch the floor and I'm 5'4" tall. This was suppose to be for a mermaid slip with a train, doesn't work. Bad thing is shipping was somewhat slow and now I have 3 days until my super important event and I have no slip and no time to order a new one :(

So... this thing was awful. I'm only 5'4" and if I wore it a few inches lower than my natural waist line, it was still about 6 inches too short.

The tulle was rough and although the pictures imply it's a fishtail, it really isn't. The hoops are round when they should have been teardrop shape and it wasn't longer in any specific area.

I tried to bend the metal hoops after I made them smaller and ended up snapping one. At that point I used tape to put it back together which in turn DID make it teardrop shape, which was ok.

With the length being so short, I had to wear it around my thighs. The top spandex like material was tight enough to keep it in place so that was ok too.

I'm waiting to see how my wedding photos turned out and them I'll really be able to tell how horrible it was or wasn't. Maybe I'm just too finicky, but this definitely was NOT something I could just throw on and go.

Will post pictures soon.

reviewText:
Who knew there were hoop petticoats that were just big enough?  I go to formal events every year which require ball gowns, cocktail dresses, etc., so often bypass particular gowns due to not being able to get just the right amount of fullness at the base without adding girth around my waist and hips.
My problem is solved with this petticoat.  Two hoops and a few layers of tulle are attached to a stretchy slip that form fits without binding and gently smooths any lumps and bumps on my hips & backside.  Very light weight, easy to step into and pull up over my hips.
To store, I turn inside out, fold & twist the hoops in half, plop it into a pillow case, & hang on a clothes hanger (hard to describe the twisting motion, but if you have experience with pop up laundry hampers, you know what I mean by twisting the hoops).

The price point is excellent and I am extremely pleased with how well this was sewn.  It provides the perfect amount of fullness that would benefit those of you who want "just enough" belling at the bottom of a gown.  Cosplayers out there, this is right up your alley.  For my critique of the product, the seller was kind enough to offer an additional discount on the petticoat.

This Lightweight, Silver Tone  Dhnewsun Simple Silver Heart Bracelet is much nicer than I expected it to be for the reasonable asking price!
It's dainty, yet sturdy and extremely well constructed.
Each section is connected to the next without the use of jump rings.  The openings which connect one section to the next are molded. They appear to be soldered shut, as I found no visible seam lines when I inspected them with my magnifying glass.

Overall length of this lovely bracelet is 8" (including the 1 1/4" - 10 link extender).
There are 2 Intertwined Open Hearts in the center of the bracelet. The larger Open Heart measures 1/2" in length and features a tiny horizontal open heart cut into the top section of it's outer edge. The smaller Open Heart measures 3/8".
The pin set 3/16" Multifaceted Crystals attached to either side of the Open Hearts sparkle like real diamonds.
When viewed from the underside, you can see the bottom of these securely set Crystals through an opening in their crown settings.
The Outer side of each Crystal's setting is connected to a 2" long Double Row of 1/16" Box Chain, which is soldered on either end to a 3/16" Solid Heart. The bracelet fastens to the links in the extender by way of an easy to manipulate 1/4" Lobster Claw Clasp.

The plating on the entire bracelet is smoothly polished. While the listing does not specify what the base metal is, I have a sensitivity to nickle based metals and have had No issues with skin irritation while wearing this bracelet.
I love that I can wear this bracelet by itself or pair it with 1 or 2 other thin bracelets I own!
I received mine at a discounted cost in exchange for evaluation and offering my honest, unbiased opinion, which I have provided.
Pleased to give it a well deserved 5 Star Recommendation.
summary: I love that I can wear this bracelet by itself or pair it with 1 or 2 other thin bracelets I own!

If you are traveling by plane this back pack is actually the right height and width for a carry on. :) Try not to fill it too much because it will be hard to get it in to the over head compartment, but with a little pushing and shoving you can get it in the compartment. Also try and put all the items that air port security will want to look at easy to get to. I was searched three times on my flights to Israel and had to repack my back pack all three times.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for a review.
I bought this bag for a general use backpack to wear on my motorcycle.  For that, it is good.  It is light weight, comfortable, and versatile.  For a backpacking backpack, I would not recommend it.  The main reason is that it lack a frame to support the weight and transfer it from your shoulders to your hips.  It does have a hip belt, that I haven't used much to talk about size or comfort, but the hip belt will not do much without without a frame.
The main zipper pocket is a little bit of a nuisance to get in and out of because of the shape and various straps getting in the way, but that is a small nit.  Overall, it is a good everyday or day pack, but I wouldn't use on a multiday trip.
summary: it is good. It is light weight

reviewText: Was heavy and a great purchase

I looooove this necklace. It's a small piece, but when added all together with my Connor cosplay, I feel great. I wore this necklace every day at work for a couple months and for 2 days in cosplay. Held up perfectly.

The pendant itself is 1 3/4 inches in diameter, is brass in coloring, and has Ubi Workshop stamped on the back.. It appears to be made of die cast metal (the same as old Hot Wheels toy cars) and is very light weight. The clasp from pendant to cord is a little cheap, it looks  to be maybe a piece of aluminum. The cord is a molded plastic designed to look like braided cording. The cord clasp is typical costume jewelry style. I wouldn't put much faith in the durability of the clasps or plastic cord and if I were to plan on wearing it, I'd replace them with a strip of leather cording. The overall look of the piece is great. The pendant really stands out and would be good to use as a cosplay costume piece. I got it for my Assassin's Creed collection so won't be wearing it. Nonetheless, for four dollars, it's totally worth it and is molded even better than I expected.

Great deal on a really nice necklace. Nice heft to the amulet and bigger than you'd probably expect. Bought this for my 13 year old son who is very picky about detail and authenticity in fandom merchandise and he's worn this every day since he received it. Good purchase, especially for such a reasonable price!
summary: Great deal on a really nice necklace

I love mirrored sunglasses. I don't really know why but I always gravitate toward them. These sunglasses are mirrored and aviator style. They are quite large - actually too large for my face but I still wear them. I chose the gold color for a change. Most of my aviators are silver. The glasses are well made with a good weight to them. They are not loose on my face like so many sunglasses are. It is the lenses that are really big on me. Then again, big sunglasses are the style these days.

These come nicely boxed and, inside, is a case that is well constructed but is cardboard. You can still use it as carry case because it s sturdy or transfer the glasses to your own case. There is a little lens cloth in there as well.

The glasses cut glare and keep everything sharp. There is no distortion with these. They fit comfortably and don't slide down even when I look down. I attached a picture of myself wearing them. I am embarrassed to post pics of myself but I think it will give you a good idea of the size. I have an average sized face.

I think these would be great if the lenses were a tad smaller. They are still quality glasses and I will wear them. I wore them the other day and they really did a good job keeping the sun out of my eyes. These are unisex and would look great on a guy because they are larger. But women as well can wear these. If I could change one more thing besides the lens size, it would be that they would be polarized. Otherwise, I'm rocking my big glasses and keeping crow's feet at bay by not squinting in the sun! The quality is much higher than cheap sunglasses at a drugstore!

**I received these glasses n exchange for my honest, unbiased review. I have no affiliation at all with the seller and did not agree or promise to write a positive review. I also was not compensated in any way for this review. I took a while to write this because I was on the fence about the lens size and whether than was a con. But if you like larger lenses, these glasses are for you!
summary: High quality mirrored sunglasses. Big lenses, unisex.

reviewText:
I like these sunglasses. Their style is unique, which allured me to them. The frames are slightly heavier than most but not enough weight to cause any comfort. One of the nose pieces was looser than the other. I tried to tighten it but inadvertently bent it instead. I was able to bend it back in position without causing any damage. The earpieces are comfortable. They don't apply excess pressure to my temples. This is great for me and allows for long term wear. The lenses are extremely mirrored. The product listing really doesn't depict this well. I hope my photos help you appreciate how mirrored these are. Overall, I really enjoy these sunglasses. They help break up the monotony of my normal style. These glasses come with a hardshell case and cleaning cloth.

I hope you enjoyed this review. If you have any questions about my experience please leave me a comment. I will be happy to follow-up on my experience with this product.

Fun bright colors, sheer breathable beach cover up. Nice and flowy, lightweight and breathable material, no buttons or ties, and dries quickly. This product was provided to me at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

I Love this! It was just what I was looking for during the summer. I wanted one for just at the beach, but I was also looking for something lightweight for when it gets super hot during the summer - just to wear over a tank top, etc. The colors in this are VERY bright. Which will make it even more fun for the summertime. It's a lot brighter than what I expected from looking at the picture. It is "Tee-shirt length" So it isn't very long. It probably hits right at the hips. Which makes sense if you were just wanting to wear it with your swimsuit at the pool or beach. If you are uncomfortable with it being too short, you'll probably need to wear it with shorts or something too. The material is super sheer, so as said before, you'll have to wear either a swimsuit or a thank top underneath. This would be great to wear around a camp fire, at a festival, even could be a good transitional piece in the spring and fall before it got too cold/hot with leggings! *I received this product at a discount for my unbiased and honest review*

While I think this would be an adorable beach cover up, I honestly wear this as a top for spring/summer. The cover up is made from 100% polyester, and is very flow like. I am usually a size large in tops, and this cover up is very loose, that is okay with me because I like really loose clothing. I choose the "purple" and the colors seem to match the description on the page perfectly. The top is made in China, and is well made. There was no holes in any of the seams, no extra string. You can wear the item as is, or tie the front to peices together into a knot, which looks cute as well. I have a lot of thess types of tops in my closet, and so far this is my favorite pattern because it is so vibrant. I am very happy with this purchase and might buy the aqua one at full price.
*I received this item at a discounted price for an honest review. These reviews are mine, and are no way effected by the discount code, or the seller.

reviewText: I purchased these shirts to go under blouses for work. I didn't have particularly high expectations given the price and was adequately satisfied. For example, I couldn't wear this tank top solo under a cardigan...for fear that you could see everything underneath. OK purchase for what I needed them for.

It's a great design, but it needs a LOT of QA work.

These ties are kind of odd product but I didn't expect much more paying $3 per tie. They worth what you pay. I give them 4 stars only considering very low price. I'll try to explain what's wrong with them.

- Length. It says 59" in description but actually they're 57.5-58", standard length for the tie.
- Width. This is not very common narrow tie, 2.75". Too wide to be considered a skinny tie, too narrow to fall into regular width ties (they're 3.25"). For a broad man it will look like a skinny tie, for a very slender man it will look like regular, for average man it will be something questionable in between. Also, this width doesn't work in style with most of the regular tie bars/clips so you need to use skinny tie bar/clip if you want to look sharp.
- Fiber. It says "100% microfiber" and I have no ideas what it is. Feels kind of rough and not nearly as soft as good quality ties. Creases very easily and doesn't keep smooth shape as good as better ties.
- Colors and design. As pictured, no complaints about it, bright and attractive designs. Beside creasing and not keeping shape well they look good.

Summary. I have about a dozen of "famous makers" ties like Michael Kors, Geoffrey Beene etc. and of course these ties can't be even compared to them by the quality, look and feel, but the price... they worth more than $3 each.
I would never wear these odd Scott Malone ties for a job interview or a fancy date, for such occasions be smart and spend $25-30 on a high quality tie that looks really sharp, but for something like everyday business casual work environment these microfiber ties can work and they come in many different colors and patterns so for the cost of one high quality tie you can get like 9 different of these.
summary: Worth the price but there is something you have to consider

I absolutely detest bras and often refer to them as torture devices. However I recently tried a thinner version of a sports bra and found it much more comfortable than a traditional bra.  I decided to try this one and LOVE it!  I am 5'7, about 175 lbs and normally wear a 38 c bra and the large fits great. It is SUPER well made and is actually quite flattering and supportive without giving me the uniboob look. I have had it for almost a week and in that time, it is the only bra I have worn...yes I DO like it that much. I washed it a couple of times and it came out looking just like new. I will definitely be purchasing a couple more of these!

PROS: This is very comfortable, a good price point, front closure (so much easier!) And a decent fit based on the recommendations in other reviews (I am 34DD and got a large).

CONS: It only offers light to medium support, so i wouldn't use this for running, and the zipper likes to pull down (maybe because I have a larger bust) so I wish that it had a little clip at the top, although it will not pop off because of the hidden middle clasp, so it still works.

Love this bra!! Usually sports bras are a huge struggle to wear trying to get over head and adjusted right, the front zip on this makes it so easy!! Plus the fabric is breathable and it still gives you the support you want in a sports bra!

I ordered the BollyQueena Women's Absolute Front Zipper Sports Bra to use while jogging and going to the gym! You can never have enough sports bras!!!

I ordered the Emerald Blue in a size XL. I am a busty woman and wear a size 34DD bra and this sports bra fit me perfectly.

This bra has a convenient zipper front with the added security of an additional hook just behind the zipper. The cups are lined and padded for discretion and it has a racer back straps.

By far, this is one of the most comfortable sports bras I have ever worn. It is light and airy feeling which allows your skin to breathe while sweating!

The XL fit me perfectly, however; it was not super tight like other sports bras I have so I did bounce around a little bit while jogging but not to much to where it was uncomfortable. If I went down to a smaller size, it would probably give me that extra tight, secure feel that I am used to but I love how this one is so extremely comfortable because it is not extra tight on me.
It does give you some medium support. Somewhere in the middle between heavy, super tight support to light fitting, no support.

The ONLY thing I did not like about this bra was while I was running the top portion of the zipper kept coming down . It would go down about an inch and stop there! Thank God for the added protection of the hook but it never went down that far. I only noticed it after taking off my shirt each day so maybe the friction and bouncing from running caused it.

Pros:
Very comfortable
Extra security hook behind zipper
Padded for discretion
Breathable material
Very soft
Medium support
Great fit

Cons:
Zipper coming down
Medium support for busty women

DISCLAIMER: I received this product for free for my ALWAYS fair, ALWAYS honest and ALWAYS unbiased review. I did not get paid for this review.
summary: Super Comfy, Soft, Breathable Material... Padded with Zipper enclosure and hook!

reviewText: I'm not sure I would recommend this for larger busted ladies. It fits well (I ordered the XL and wear a 42C) and the material is comfortable, but the zipper won't stay closed unless you get it just right. When it does close properly, it's a nice sports bra, but I wouldn't trust it if you plan to wear it outside of your house (the zipper can come down at any moment!). I do think the design is nice, as there is a hook underneath the zipper so the front doesn't come completely undone when the sports bra is unzipped. If the zipper was better, I think I would definitely give this sports bra 5 stars, as it is actually well made minus the zipper issue (and very comfortable). There are molded pads in the bra too for some extra coverage and support. I think that this sports bra would work just fine for smaller busted women, but for me, I could never use it to work out in. It does make a great night time bra though to wear underneath my pajamas! Please be advised that I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: Great If Not For The Zipper Issue...

This is a super cute Enterprise D ship replica for a keychain. I put it on my husbands keys and he was very happy. This is a nice metal cast of the ship. I really love this Replica keychain. I am a huge Star Trek fan and this is a really nice metal copy of my favorite ship in the universe. I was super excited to put it on my keys. There is a lot of detail to this little model, all over it. The  ship is large on my keys but it is hollow so that it does not weigh too much while in the car ignition. I am really pleased to show off my Geek with this keychain. I recieved this product at a discount in exchange for a fair and honest review.

Star Trek Enterprise D Key Chain

Well the first item I was sent was a Boba Fett Slave One ship keychain from Star Wars. I wrote the company and they sent me the correct key chain and let me keep the mess up order key chain as well. They were polite and responded fairly quickly. I am not a huge Star Wars fan (nothing against but not my favorite in the realm of science fiction), but I gave it away to a friend of mine who is. It seemed to take forever to wait for the correct order, but I know they were shipping from Asia so it always takes a while.

This Star Trek Enterprise D keychain looks like it does in the sellers photos. The chain part of the key chain is connected to the back of the ship. I think it would look cooler attached to the front, because it hangs upside down. But for the price this is a great key chain. The metal seems solid. It is very smooth. It seems to be very sturdy.

I am happy to add this key chain to my keys which already include a Borg cube flash light key chain, and a Star Trek communications badge key chain (the Star trek triangle insignia).

reviewText:
These just arrived in the mail today, so I haven't been able to evaluate how well they will hold up, but now I'm wondering...
They arrived packaged very nicely in a pretty green box and were securely wrapped.  I received a tiny bag of earring backs (lots of rubber ones and one set of metal ones).  The earrings were tiny and delicate as I expected.  They are slightly smaller than an identical design I have purchased from Ann Taylor earlier this year.  So as far as looks go, they are great.
I went to put the metal earring back on the earring and the post bent!  It is very soft metal and seems that the gauge of the post is too fat to go in the metal back.  I tried the rubber backs with the same result.  Thankfully I was able to bend the post back in place.  I tried other rubber backs that I already owned and was finally successful with a completely different earring back (the kind with a larger plastic disk and metal back).
Other than the SOFT metal that the post is made of and the fact that the earring backs provided don't fit, I really like these earrings.  I love my Ann Taylor pair in gold, so was happy to find this pair in silver.  If you're not overly concerned with quality and are willing to have earrings that are fragile, these are lovely.

reviewText: Great quality, great fit! Love it!

I reviewed this dress and received it at a deep discount. I was very excited to review the stress because I thought it would be the perfect addition to a summer wardrobe and like the flexibility of changing the tap to look more appropriate for different types of social situations. I have included pictures of three ways I have worn the dress and how I assembled the top. I bought a size medium and I'm 5 foot 7 inches tall. It fits me perfectly but if you were shorter than that it would drag on the floor in this size. I do recommend making sure you have white or neutral colored underwear on underneath as any type of colored or print would show through on the light. I used a sports bra with the dress but you could put a tank top on underneath to cover up a bra. I am not one to go without support so I did not try it without a bra on.
If you look in the photos you will see there is a full length mirror behind me so that you can see what the back looks like when I have it tied each way. Some ways will show more skin in the back than others. If you don't like that then I suggest wearing a tank top underneath. I think it is a good idea to look at reviews on here and see pictures of how other people have worn the dress.
I am excited that it fits me perfectly and can't wait to wear it on a girls weekend and this summer.
Very comfortable and functional

I love this dress! It goes all the way to my ankles and Im 5ft7. I got size large. The belly is a bit snug, but otherwise, perfect fit and the rest is following. I recommend throwing it on over your head and not stepping through it if you got some curvy hips. The straps are super long, you tie up around your neck and then again under the girls. Can look very beautiful! Can also make it into a turtle neck/scarf necked dress. Can show some cleavage or cover them up. Very easy to dress up, dress down and wear multiple ways. I can even make this into a skirt, tie the top around the back, make a bow and have a beautiful flowing back side. Very nice from the waist down, its just a bit tight on the mid section for me. Im working on losing weight, so I will be very very happy with this dress then. In the meantime, it really doesnt look that bad on me at all. I weigh 170lbs  and wear size 12 jeans currently, if that helps anyone judge which size to get.

reviewText: I was very excited to wear this dress to an event I was attending.  I waited patiently (over a month) for it to arrive at my doorstep.  Upon opening the box, the first thing I noticed was stray strings (think fishing wire) over several parts of the dress.  Once the dress was removed from the box, the perpetual shower of sequins began.  I assumed I would lose some here and there, but I literally had to drag my vacuum cleaner around to pick up after myself.  Ignoring the mess, I tried on the dress.  The fit was horrible.  The top of my dress did not have as deep of a V as the picture shown; the "V" stopped just under my collar bone.  The ruching on the chest was uneven (some substantially wider than others) and stuck out away from my chest.  The shoulder straps were wider than in picture.  There are bra cups sewn into the dress and they in no way cupped my breast, but rather sat on the upper part of them.  The dress zipped up, but was not flattering at all.  I order many dresses online and am pretty good at assessing my measurement, I even ordered up a size in this dress.  IMHO, I feel the dress in the picture is not the "knock off" I received.  Unfortunately, my event was only 2 days after my dress arrived, so I went with a dress I already owned.  On the plus side, now my kids have made a game of finding all the stray sequins in the house.....weeks after the dress was unveiled.
summary: Disappointment from a frequent online dress buyer and formal gown wearer

reviewText: Loved it! Fits perfectly. Very elegant and beautiful!
Beautiful

This Pair of Round Cut Out Cat Eye Sunglasses from SojoS is super cute and trendy both on and off the eyes.  I love the design of these glasses as they are one of a kind to any others I own.  I chose the black/gold frame with grey lenses and they match with just about any outfit choice.  Included with the glasses is a nice fabric drawstring pouch and cleaning cloth.

The glasses are black with a pop of gold color in the frames.  They have round black lenses, unlike some of the other color selections these are not mirrored.  They aren't oversized but do cover the whole eye area and most of the brow bone.  The frames have a cat eye look to them being pointed in the upper corners.  This style is really popular in Hollywood right now amongst the celebrities.

The glasses have comfort grips behind the ear area on the arms.  They also have clear padded nose clips for comfort.  I could wear these all day and forget I even have them on.  When I am not wearing them I can sit them on top of my head as well as use them to hold my hair back when out in the hot sun.

These glasses offer 100% protection against harmful UVA/UVB rays.  I wear these often as they are very stylish and trendy drawing attention and compliments.  I look forward to purchasing another color of the same design.

If your looking for style, comfort, and protection this is sure to please your needs.  I highly recommend this pair of sunglasses.  I received this item free in exchange for my honest unbiased review.  All opinions are 100% my own.  If you have any questions please feel free to comment below and I will do my best to answer them for you.
summary: Love, Love, Love The Cat Eye Look Of These Glasses, Super Trendy & Stylish This Season!  Look Great On & Off

It's nice to own a belt that doesn't feel like it's made out of cardboard. Or a belt that is made from "PU" leather (also known as Pee Yew because it's fake and smells like chemicals.) This belt from Boston Leather is made of Genuine Full Grain Leather. You can really tell the difference when you take it out of the package. It is sturdy yet soft enough to reach around your waist without digging into your sides. This belt also has that nice leather smell that won't give you a headache from being synthetic.

I have "about" a 36" waist and ordered size 38. It's the perfect size with enough holes on either side of the target hole that will give me room to grow or shrink. Since it is clearly constructed well, I do not see the need to buy a new belt any time soon.

The best part about this belt is it is very reasonably priced for what you get. I used to buy my belts at discount stores and this is only a 1/4 more in price but the quality is much better than that. No more cardboard, no more headaches. This is a winner!

reviewText:
It's been a while since I bought a new belt as my current two were high-quality name brand belts.  I have and old black belt from Nautica that is very similar to this belt.  The key differences between this belt and that one are primarily in the leather and the buckle.  The leather on this belt has a very nice soft feel as if it is already broken in.  However, the leather is so soft that after just a few days or wearing it I have already noticed that the leather is bunching up around the belt loops.  This belt already has more creasing and belt loop marks than my old Nautica belt that I have been wearing for the past several years.  The second drawback about this belt is the clasp.  The metal rolling tube that the belt slides one has a seam.  This seam impedes the belt from rolling on smoothly. Admittedly this is a small concern and not a big issue but its just not something you will see on a more expensive belt.  Despite the drawbacks that I listed this belt has a beautiful color, feel, and nice leather smell.  Plus it is made in the USA which is always nice.

Disclaimer:  I received this product at a free or reduced rate to provide an honest and unbiased review.  The above statements are based on my own personal experiences with the product.
summary: Good belt but lacks name brand touches.....

reviewText: Nice belt, good quality,true size

When hubby's belt started to crack, we knew we needed to replace it before it reached its final destination - the circular file. We got an opportunity to purchase this one from Boston Leather at a discounted price, in exchange for a detailed evaluation and honest review. I'm glad we ordered it but wish it were a little higher quality.

The sizing is right on target. Hubby wears size 34 waist trousers, and the recommended 36-inch belt is a perfect fit. The leather is nicely finished and the understated buckle is what my husband wanted. A lot of the wild buckles look cool online, but most of the men I know want basic. This one's basic. There's a metal roll tube at the outer edge of the buckle, which I guess serves some purpose but honestly looks kind of tacky. It doesn't really serve much purpose, unless it's to reinforce what lies inside. I've seen belts like that before and thought the idea went out in the 90's..

I can't give it more stars because it's good enough, but nothing spectacular. As other people noted, the leather is soft. For a lot of things, softer is better. For a belt you want a bit more rigidity. I don't know how long this one will last, and assume it won't be very long. I foresee a new belt in the near future.
summary: Nice looking basic belt, so-so quality

I purchased and used the Synthic Apparel belt for a while, and I really like the look and feel of this belt, its very comfortable and seems to be well made and the buckle itself is made of solid metal and it adjusts very smoothly.

Size: It fits for me true to size like the company's discreption says "MAKE SURE TO ORDER 1 SIZE BIGGER THEN YOUR PANTS SIZE, There are 5 belt buckle holes so you can really adjust this belt quite a bit if you lose/gain a little weight, And if you don't want to take a chance on having a small belt then is recommended to buy 2 sizes bigger than your pant size, in that way you can always use it by the last of the 5 holes or even make new holes.

Belt has perfect stitching, all stitches are straight and there are no loose strings. This includes also the stitching for the dual belt loops.
I definitely recommend it for anyone!

The belt comes wrapped in a plastic bag. There is no box like some of the other manufacturers. The belt is black in color and is true to size. The buckle is made of nickel but its not shiny but rather grainy like. It looks as pictured.

The quality of the belt is sturdy and bends freely. The bending does not initiate a crease or a scratch. There are ample number of holes on the belt and further can be customizable. I would make sure you order the size that fits you. I had accidentally chosen the default size. The thickness of the belt is also reasonable and not thin as most cheap belts. This belt is thicker and will last longer. This belt is also a bit on the wider side so you will need to check the slots on your pants/shorts to check if this will be sufficient.  This belt notes that it has been made in USA on the back with the company logo.

Overall, this is definitely a very good quality belt with a reasonable price tag and would recommend based on the color, durability, and thickness.

reviewText:
I generally speaking am a cheapskate when it comes to clothing, I wear through things quickly enough that the quality doesn't seem to matter a whole lot, so typically I buy the cheap department store belts at a similar price to this one ~$20-25. I can say without question that quality wise this belt appears to be much nicer. The leather on this belt as well as the closure seem to be well built and sturdy, I can't imagine the leather wearing out on this belt too quickly and the closure itself seems quite durable as well. One thing to note is the "Stretch" part of this belt. I have had issues in the past with elastics losing the elasticity and further staying stretched out. I certainly hope that doesn't happen here, but if it does I will update this review. One aspect that I do like about the stretch is that it conforms when I sit down, I can cinch a belt down as needed and it will stretch slightly when I put pressure on it sitting.

I purchased this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Nice good quality belt - stretches for better or worse.

I did have to make an extra hole for him. And that took some time. It was very difficult to make without being aggressive an ruining the belt. I used a knife and put the belt on a hard surface and spun the knife around until I was all the way through. Then I did the same after i flipped it over. The hole was still small and so I used the belt tab thing to widen it. It came out pretty good and it hasn't streched out in the month its been since I made the hole.
Overall, this belt has exceeded my expectations for it and would definitely reccomend to those who are skeptical or wary of buying from the internet. This is quality leather.

This belt is probably a little better quality than most of the belts advertised as 'genuine leather'.  It seems to be solid leather, rather than some kind of composite man-made material, made of leather, and who knows what else?  I was hoping for thicker leather,  It seems pretty thin for a heavy-duty, solid, leather belt.  Also disappointing was that the finished surface of the belt was quite noticeably  scuffed on the 4 inches, or so, at the end with the holes.  I am assuming it was because the belt was shipped in very lightweight flexible packaging, and as the belt was wound with the scuffed end on the outside of the coil, that the finished surface was damaged from some kind of rubbing in transit.  At least that is what I stated in my review of the packaging.  I prefer to think that the packaging was at fault, and not because the belt was sold, worn a bit by someone, returned, and then resold as new.  Although I am not sure, and the more I wear it, the more I question my theory of poor packaging as the only cause.

On a more positive note, I must agree that this belt is better than most.  Just disappointed that it wasn't ALL that I expected.

reviewText: Clutch and Crossbody Double-Function Bag Very cute, durable well-constructed bag! I got this for my daughter, and we live in a metropolitan area where we can pretty much walk to everything. She likes this because it's the perfect size, and lightweight. Can wear as a crossbody bag and adjust the straps, or use the wrist strap. It's so versatile and has more room than other mini bags, can hold more than just her phone, and has a good number of compartments that are quick and easy to get to. The material is like a textured faux leather, feels great and doesn't look "cheap". Also easy to wipe clean. This is really a great deal for the list price also- wish they still had in the tan pictured color, for I would buy that one also! Looks very stylish, and can wear with casual or dressy attire. [Disclaimer: I purchased this product at a discount from the seller, in exchange for my totally honest, unbiased review.]

I ordered the Auger Vintage Laptop Backpack because 1) I wanted a durable canvas pack for traveling 2) It's super cool & retro looking!

Love the sturdy canvas fabric, leather strap details, and retro look metal zips and buckles! It's a well made backpack that did not disappoint.

Well thought out details include a slide casing for easy open (drawstring) many roomy pockets inside and out suitable for smart phones, cameras, water bottles, a mini tablet, laptop, kindles etc. You may want to have your electronics (stored in zippered pockets) in cases as the metal teeth of the zipper could scratch as you get items in/out.  There are pockets with Velcro where that would not be a concern.

The color I choose was Khaki since I thought it showed the strap details to their best advantage. True to the photos on Amazon it's actually more "Carhartt brown" rather than classic Khaki (which is what I was hoping for) . Carhartt canvas clothing is tough -and so is this pack which makes me happy! My favorite pocket is on the back of the pack- perfect size for keeping money and great location for that purpose. So far, the only use has been as a daypack: from ATV mud rides to trips to town in the car- but I'm looking forward to taking this pack for some extended travel in the future...

These aren't bad for the price. I have small wrists and without a hair tie these bracelets would likely fall off, but with the elastics, they do the job. It takes some time getting used to how to get the elastic in the bracelet, and similar to other reviews, the since the groove isn't very deep, the elastic can pop out.

There is a 3pc option of the same item which is noted as "new" 3pc (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MQM97DM/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0?th=1), and in the image, the grooves appear to be deeper than the ones in the bracelets I purchased (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01DLQJB4K/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0?th=1). These look like the might hold the elastics in place better. But since I only wanted 2 of the 3 colors I did not have the option to purchase the bracelets with the deeper grooves.
summary: OK, but grooves aren't very deep and elastics can fall out.

reviewText: This bag is great! Bought it for my 11 yr old son and he loves it. It has a pocket in the front large enough to hold a tablet and inside there is zippered pocket and two smaller open pockets. In the pictures there is an iPad Mini in the front pocket and a Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 in the main compartment. It's not a very large bag but its a little bigger than I expected and the perfect size for what he needs. You probably will not fit a laptop unless it's a small netbook size. The quality looks great. It looks well made and durable. I only wish it had a pocket on the back on the outside but other than that I am very pleased with it and so is my son. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. This does not affect my opinion. Everything I expressed is how me and my son feel (since he's the one that uses it)

This bag is perfect for me. The quality is perfect - it's very durable and well put together. The quality of the material is strong and there are no weaknesses in any part of the bag. The bag itself is large for storage but doesn't feel large as a bag. It's very comfortable to use. I stress tested certain areas that are known to cause issues on bags and didn't see any weaknesses or problems. This quickly became my every day bag and I'm absolutely in love with it.

I received this product discounted in exchange for my honest review, but I was in no way compensated or influenced to give any opinion other than my own. I would not attest to a product that I wouldnt recommend to a friend or purchase again for myself.
The product was shipped safely and quickly as expected. I trust this company and this product and would absolutely purchase or recommend this again.
summary: This bag is perfect for me

reviewText: I'm digging this bag. It's durable, stitched well, and made to last. The leather on the front is meant to be scratched and beat up which adds to the look of the bag. The strap is adjustable and long enough to be slung across the body. The main pocket is wide enough to fit a tablet/iPad as well as a book and your essentials. The front pocket is much larger than I expected and holds keys as well as a phone. There are two inside pockets which are small enough to hold a card-size wallet as well as lip balms/glosses - too shallow for pens. Finally, there is an inside zippered pocket that's large enough for a wallet or other feminine items. The two front snaps are magnetic. I like this bag and it has come to replace another one I wore out. I received this at a discount in exchange for a review.
summary: Rugged, durable, flexible. Perfect for everyday use or trips

I am 5''4" tall and weigh about 120 pounds. I typically wear a US size 2 or a small/ medium in similar styles at retailers like Victoria's Secret, Kohls or JCPenney. I ordered the "Bestlife Ladies Sexy Lingerie Tempting Sling Dress For Sleepwear" in a size medium. It fits me very well. The bust is a halter style, which is adjustable. It fits snug in the chest and flairs open below. The babydoll is on the shorter side, hitting around the hips. The set includes a matching pair of boyshort style panties. Together, this is a cute set to wear to bed. The see through nature of the top makes it a difficult sell for wearing around the house, but this is great for feeling sexy at bedtime.

The material is soft synthetic blend. It is very easy to care for. I can wash and dry this garment with like colors on normal settings. The hems and lace detailing are well constructed and smooth and comfortable against the skin. The lace is not itchy. I definitely recommend the "Bestlife Ladies Sexy Lingerie Tempting Sling Dress For Sleepwear" as a gift for yourself or the lady in your life. This is one of my most comfortable babydolls. I wish it was available in multiple colors. It is very competitively priced. Similar items at Victoria's Secret retail for $40+ and then you are charged shipping fees when ordering through their website. This item is $15 with shipping. It ships from overseas, which takes roughly 2 weeks. Overall, the price and quality are unbeatable.

reviewText:
This shirt was true to size and looks nice with the slim fit style. I received this item for testing and a honest review. I was a bit worried that this shirt would run small but by following the guide I picked a Medium and it fits as well as other medium shirts. The slim fit style may not be for everyone and you usually need to be in decent shape to pull it off. There are stripped lines and patterns on portions of the shirt that really help it stand out and get attention. I think that most would find this shirt quite fashionable and modern.

The material is a cotton blend and it is comfortable to wear, there were no problems wearing it all day. The fabric has a good thickness to it and it's not too thin like some inexpensive shirts I've seen. It has held up well to several washings with no color fading or frayed edges.
summary: Nice slim fit shirt that's true to size.

My 18 year old is a string bean (6'1 and 150lbs) and wears a medium in shirts. I had to get an extra large in this so that it would fit. Other than that, it's a nice shirt. The shirt is really nice. It comes just as pictured. It's true to size and is made of great quality. The color is also vibrant. Before I ordered this shirt, I was skeptical about it. Many questions ran through my mind; Was it going to look as it does in the pictures? Was it going to fit my boyfriend well. But once this shirt came in the mail and I opened the package, I was completely blown away. It lived up to what's shown in the pictures. The shirt is well tailored and the embroidery on the right chest and left sleeve of this shirt is well done. The fabric is thick and is of great quality. It fits my boyfriend very well. This shirt can be dressed up or dressed down depending on what you pair it with. For the office, You can add a nice pair of slacks with this shirt. For a day out, you can pair this shirt with a pair of great quality jeans. I'm overall impressed with this shirt, it's very sharp and will look great on anyone. I give this fashion forward shirt a 5. I purchased and received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: Good quality tights but much too small

Came across these nylons on Amazon as I was looking for my regular Silky Sheers ones. As these were inexpensive and had good reviews, I decided to give them a try, even though it was a rather obscure company. This was 4 (!) months ago and I'm still wearing them! As a clerk in a grocery store, I go through nylons quite quickly, but these have held up amazingly well. They have a hole or two, but nothing that a little clear nail polish can't fix.  I usually wear them once or twice and than wash them again, due to foot odour problems. If I could change anything I would make the reinforced part up top a bit thicker. I also might go up a size just to lengthen their life.
Definitely a good buy; highly recommended!

reviewText:
These are the ones.  In the nude they look like my own legs but better.  A perfect semi sheer and semi sheen.  I'm 5'6" and 160lbs which is in the middle of their "large" sizing.  Definitely follow their recommendations on how to make them last and how to put on: I always pre-stretch them and make my nails are not raggedy.  These are pretty durable: I was playing with a friend's child on Halloween and fell in the non-so-soft grass and sticks: my knee was scraped, but the tights were fine.  No exaggeration, they look like they did when I pulled them out of the package.  So, even if you're rough on your tights, these can take some abuse.

Also, the material is really soft, some hose are really scratchy and horrible.  If you like this look, get three or four pairs, they should last you a whole season or more.

"" ------------ Begin message -------------

hi, dear buyer. We are sorry about this. do you want to exchange item? Cause the shipping fee is high(we haven't offer return shipping fee, cause our return address was in US), we would like refund you 20% item price, if you can keep it; if you still don't want to keep it, we will give you return address, after you return please must tell us your return tracking number or shipping receipt, It will as a proof you have return item to us. After this we will full refund you! :) Waiting for your reply. any question please contact with us. Thank you!

(Cause time different between China and US, so we may cant reply you e-mail in time. But Once we see your e-mail, we will reply to you asap. Thank you for your patience! Have a nice day! ^Q^) ""

reviewText:
I received this item at a discounted price for an honest and non bias opinion.

Pro:
  It give me a little more motion because they way it is designed.
  I thought the design is cool, and it turn out just that.  Gotten good compliments for the color and style.
  The item arrive just as in the picture, I like the zip pouch for my 6" phone.
  The main compartment fit my 10" laptop thick cover case snugly.
  The side pouches tightly fit an arrow head water bottle.  This could be a con.

Con:
  Beside the arrow head water bottle size I can't fit anything bigger.
  The base does not have cushion, which why I had to fit my 10" laptop case into the main compartment. It slides in easy enough. I've pic to show.
  No place to hold a pen or two, which I think one of the side pocket should be alter for that.

*** SUMMARY**
  I think the bag design is cool and it fits what I want for my small laptop and phone. I have squeeze a water bottle if I want one.  I would recommend it as a gift or for yourself.

Thanks for tuning in.  I'll update if there is changes need to address.  Click the "helpful" button below if you like the review, and ask question or comment.

Disclaimer: I received this item at a discount in return for my HONEST review.  The following statements are my TRUE opinions of the product.

Appearance:  This bag is so adorable.  I bought it for my husband and he is so happy with it.  He says it makes him feel like Indiana Jones...  I don't know about that, but it really does have a nice look to it.  The only thing I don't really like is that the leather piece on the front says some weird things.  The way that it is worded makes it very obvious this bag was made in a country where the main language is NOT English.

Construction/ Functionality: This bag is surprisingly well made.  Stitching is well done, and there are magnetic snaps rather than velcro. (no one likes velcro.)  I love that there are so many different pockets to hold so many different things.  We took the bag on vacation immediately after it came in the mail and it was a wonderful way to carry items needed for tourism events.

Shipping Packaging:  This item came expediently and packaged nicely in a cardboard box.

Bottom Line:  This bag is so awesome, I now want to buy one for myself.

We ordered this bag as my husband was looking for something to replace his full sized satchel. He works for the Forest Service and wants to be able to carry more than he can fit in his pockets, but has little need for a full sized bag. In this respect, the size is perfect. He is able to carry his wallet, an 8 inch tablet, his smart phone, spare battery, his work phone, a small flashlight, his multi-tool, cigarettes, lighter and his stop smoking aides (lol), keys, work gloves, a few other small sundries without the bag looking overwhelmingly full. The photos attached (of the bag full) are from after nearly 3 full weeks of use, they show the items that are in the bag and how they fit in, just to give you an idea of the capacity.

The bag has a flap over the front that uses magnetic snaps for closure. Under the flap there is a flat open pocket (slide in a notebook and pen, perhaps?) attached to a slightly larger zipper pocket. This zipper pocket is attached to the man portion of the bag, which is the largest of the pockets. This pocket has fabric and a drawstring to keep your items secure. On each side of the bag you'll find a small mesh pocket and on one side is a very small pocket with a flap and button.

From a construction standpoint, the bag seems to be well made. The canvas fabric is nice and thick, all of the stitching is solid and all of the buckles, leather and straps are firmly attached. In the weeks we've had it, it has been used daily, taken into the forest, tossed into trucks, dropped on the ground and is holding up very well so far.

There are a couple of things that I might change about this bag if given the opportunity. Probably most notable being the side pocket. It is quite small. Not nearly large enough for a smart phone. It works for us because the work phone being used in there is an older style phone (think small flip) but if I were relying on that space to hold my smartphone, I'd be disappointed. Additionally, I'd like to see the buckles used as actual buckles rather than as decor. The magnetic snaps are working fantastically, but I could see the buckles potentially lasting longer.

All in all I'd recommend this bag and would certainly buy it again if we found ourselves in need of something similarly sized.

I received this bag sooner than expected, which is always great. Ok, to start, this bag is a really nice looking bag and appears to be good quality material. It has several external pockets for storage and a larger drawstring opening inside that holds lots more. It fits my wallet, car keys, my .380, cell phone, charger, keys and badge for work, lip gloss, and a small makeup bag. I work on the go and this is a great cross body bag that keeps my hands free. I highly recommend this bag for anyone trying to carry essentials but keep it light at the same time. The adjustable strap is also a plus so that it hangs comfortably at my hip. I love it.

This is the second Augur bag I've purchased.  The larger one I've used for well over a year, dragging it to work on an almost daily basis.  My reason for buying this Vintage Canvas Leather Parchwork satchel fits a new need: hiking both trails and sidewalks.  The space for iPad, phone, book and assorted odds and ends is perfect as well as the fit.  Having something that fits the body so well without it floppy around is paramount.  The workmanship is wonderfully detailed. Clasps, buckles and heavy-duty cotton duck cloth are first rate.  For any price, this is a great bag.
summary: Yet Another Great Bag from Augur

reviewText:
Nice sheer spring/summer scarf that can be worn multiple ways. If it is a little chilly, just wrap and make a knot closer around your neck. The scarf is long so it can be tied in multiple ways to suit your fancy. You could even use the scarf for a head wrap. White is a little off white - but still white. Polka dots break up the white and makes the item versatile for wearing with multiple colors or patterns. The classic pattern will not go out of style.
The only drawback is that the scarf comes from overseas and takes a while to get to the US. Since it is Spring... I would order now so that you get it soon for spring wear.
I do need to disclose that I purchased this item at a reduced cost to give my honest review. So that is what you got. At full price the scarf is worth it... and even the shipping wait makes it worth it. A wardrobe staple for years to come.
If this review was helpful. Click the box below.

This is a nice, lightweight for spring scarf. The white is not quite a crisp white - it's a little off white but close enough to wear with other white clothing. I like the length - it's long enough to double wrap for this plus size girl. The shipping took quite some time as it is coming from overseas. But it was packaged safely in a plastic wrapper inside an envelope. Over all I am pleased with this fun scarf!

I was fortunate enough to get this free or at a discount in exchange for an honest review, and I would buy it again at full price . The price does not influence my feedback or review. I only leave good reviews when the products meet my expectations and I would refer to my friends or family.

reviewText:
When I first opened the package, I agreed with other reviewers, they were teeny tiny and didn't look they would fit.  The material was super stretch, not cotton like but with a sheen to it.  I was glad I ordered a size up per other reviewers advice.  It fit perfectly, no muffin top.  These were not like leggings.  These had a stretch and pull to them, like spandex, where it gave you curves and hid certain lines and bulges.  When I first put them on, I thought why would they sew the stitching inside out? It pulled up to a really nice area, high waist, hiding the tummy.  I really liked the product and was sad thinking I would have to return it because the stitching was on the outside between the pants and waist band.  Then figured out I was supposed to pull the top band down! Dum Dum.  Once I pulled it down, it all made sense. Duh.  However, once I was wearing it correctly, it wasn't high waist for me anymore.  It reached right around my waist.  Overall, I really like this product, it made my rear look kinda nice.

I bought these cleats for my son, the second pair of this style he's owned.  He is a super tall kid with super big feet and he loves these cleats.  They are a true high top, which is hard to find, and the ankle and foot support they provide through the 'molded' style is really good.  They are incredibly lightweight but so durable - my son has worn his previous cleats for two seasons and they are still holding up (he'll be saving this new pair for games until the old ones give out completely) - for the price, I am impressed.  Plus, they look amazing.  My son swears these are the most comfortable cleats he's ever worn and he never complains of his feet hurting after hours on the field.  We are a family on a budget, but I feel like the price of these is definitely justified - like I said, he's gotten 2 seasons of wear out of them, which is just crazy given how many practices and games they've been through.  I highly recommend them.

The printing is that type that sticks to itself & peels apart. I bought 3 of these shirts & upon washing the first one the printing got damaged.

reviewText:
I ordered this tie for my dad. He is not a huge tie person and has never really been one but he does wear one occasionally for special events so I decided he might as well have a new one on hand, and he did not have a blue one yet so why not. It wasn't really sure what to expect but this tie is actually very nice! It is made out of 100% Polyester microfiber and feels as if it is very good quality. As I said earlier, I ordered it in the blue and it has smaller kind of diamond/circle shapes on it. Sometimes ties or patterns like this hurt my eyes because there is so much going on but I really like this tie and so does he. He is planning on wearing it to my sisters graduation in June. Overall, I really like this tie and would greatly recommend it. It is very nice quality and you can not beat the price. Next time he needs another tie again I will purchase one of the other two colors for sure.

With their low price, my expectations for for these belts were modest but I was very pleasantly surprised when they arrived.  The metal buckle is very substantial and sturdy, the webbing is heavy, and the belt is very well put together and looks as if it will last a long, long time.  A couple of things to be aware of:  The webbing is pretty wide (around 2" wide).  It will fit nicely in regular sized belt loops, but may be too wide for  very narrow loops.  The webbing is nylon and is a little shiny, which is noticeable in the lighter colors, (but not so much in the black).  I think probably they will get less shiny with use, but at first they are a little shiny.  Also, in order to keep the webbing from unravelling, the webbing has been melted a bit at the open end of the belt.  Again, in the dark colors this is not noticeable, but in the lighter colors, it introduces a bit of discoloration.  For me a web belt like this is for practical, casual use and these slight cosmetic issues don't matter.  Overall I think these belts are a great value.

I got the NBUSO mens diamond LK69mpattern necktie for a friend who has to wear a tie on occasion at work. He likes the colors black and gray so I thought this tie would be perfect for him. Black and gray basically go with everything so he could wear this tie with just about any shirt he is wearing that day. The tie looks professional and quality made. The stitching is well done and the fabric is nice. The diamond pattern is attractive and not too busy. The tie could easily be worn in a professional as well as a casual setting. My friend was happy to receive this tie as he said he doesnt have any black ties so this is a welcomed addition to his tie arsenal. I am by no means a tie expert nor do I claim to be, but my friend likes the tie and that is all that really matters to me.
I received this product either free or at a reduced price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I as a consumer, count on Amazon reviews when I purchase items for myself, family, or friends to make economical and responsible decisions.  This is why I elected to start reviewing in order to help others make responsible decisions as well. I am just a regular person who has taking the initiative to test out different products and review what I thought of them. I am in no way paid by any seller for my review, but as stated, I have received the item (s) at a reduced cost or free. I take many things into consideration when compiling my review such as the price of the item, is it worth what is being charged, does the item do what is claimed, the materials used to make the item, is the item durable and versatile, and practicality of use. These are just a few things that I consider when reviewing an item.

reviewText:
Pros: Great colors, durable, Great length, great pattern, makes a great gift
Cons: None at this time

I ordered this wonderful tie for my husbands work collection. He absolutely loved it and it is a great addition to his work clothes. The colors are vivid and bright and overall it is sewn together very well. There were a few loose strings but I was able to cut them off without any issues. It is made of 100% polyester microfiber and already cleaned the tie in my at home dry cleaning kit in the dryer.

The pattern is unique and could be worn for both business and casual events based on the shirt you wear it with. It has a great modern pattern and overall a great quality and construction. As soon as I received the ties, I unpacked them from the plastic wrap and hand washed them. The tie did not fade and held up fine even when I used the steam kit in my dryer. The great thing about these ties is that they match many different shirts and colors.

Overall, my experience with the tie was wonderful. The shipping was fast and arrived in the provided timeframe and the product arrived undamaged. If you're shopping for new ties to enhance your wardrobe then you have found your match! I have no complaints about the product or the shipping process and I would definitely purchase this again. Disclosure: I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for an honest review.

Very flattering - I bought this to hide a little tummy I can't get rid of after my second baby. (For reference, I am 5'6' and pre-babies wore size 10 or 12 pants and a M or L top.  Post babies I currently wear size 14 pants and an XL top. I bought this in XXL and am back to buy it in more colors.) It does the tummy trick nicely. My arms have also gotten a bit bigger than normal, between carrying extra pounds and carrying a chunky baby. So, I am always afraid the arms on these things will be too tight, but that's not the case here - they are perfect, they don't ride up, and are long enough cover my arms while I work on the toning. The fabric is an unusual mesh that doesn't seem like it will wrinkle. This would be great for traveling and can be dressed up or down. I'm a teacher and am very aware of necklines that are too low or fabric that is too thin so I'm dressed appropriately and conservatively, and this shirt is lined front and back (not the arms) so that isn't an issue. Like I said, I'm here to buy it in more colors so I obviously love it - do be aware of the odd sizing!
summary: Marvelous but the sizing is weird.
