I was really worried about sizing since I am a 34D-32DD in my bust area, but wear an XS for bottoms. Typically when I buy swimsuits they either fit me really well around the top and are loose every place, or vice Versa. I purchased color B6 in this suit and went with a size M and it fit me awesome (I really didn't have high expectations for that and had planned to do some altering, but there's no need to do any alters as this suit fits beautifully!)

IN LOVE. I chose this particular style and pattern because I loved the bohemian vibe of it. I envisioned wearing this suit to all the music festivals I have plans to go to this summer and love that it doubles as a bodysuit. I totally would wear this swimsuit out at night under a pair of cut offs. I paired the suit up with a few different shorts & outfits in the photos I posted to help you out if you are undecided on whether or not this is a good style for you. Hopefully it helps show you how adorable this bathing suit is alone AND as an actual day or night time outfit.

SIZING & FIT. This is definitely cut on the smaller size and could vary depending on your body type. I am about a 34D up top, but can normally size down to a 32 and go with DD. My waist is about 24-25 inches around and I normally chose an XS or SM in US sizes. The medium in this suit fit me excellent (I would be swimming in a medium size if this was based off of a US size chart). The material is stretchy, however I would definently recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes depending on body shape. If you have a smaller bust, but thicker booty, I think sizing up by 1 would work... if you have a larger bust and thicker booty, I would probably size up by 2 in this swimsuit style.

Another thing that really helped draw me to this suit is the high cut neck. I love the high cut neck look for this summer. The black and white tribal-ish pattern on the suit is adorable. Also, the low cut back with the criss crossed straps look awesome when you put this suit on. The legs are higher cut so it doesn't cut your legs off and make shorter legged gals look even shorter. If you were blessed with really long legs, this suit will look even more amazing on you.

FEELS. The material isn't the most luxurious. It's basic swimsuit material. I can promise you though that no one is going to look at you and think what you're wearing looks cheap. I am extremely particular about what I wear and would be embarrassed to put something on if I thought it made me look cheap. I would HAPPILY wear this suit out in public and would flaunt it at that. It's THAT cute. I did receive this swimsuit to sample for free, but a positive review was not a requirement. I only give five stars to products, whether I paid full price or recieved a discount, when the review is deserved.

Overall, I would absolutely recommend this swimsuit I tried. It is cute, it fits me great, and it doubles as an outfit as well as a swimsuit.

I know it's always tough trying to make a decision on size, especially when it comes to Asian sizing vs US. I would be happy to answer any questions or send additional pics of the suit if you comment below. I can try and help you out as best as I can so you chose the right size for you! You will not be disappointed with this swimsuit style though.
summary: Very bohemian chic! Music Festival go to outfit/swimsuit!

I told the seller I wanted a refund because I wouldn't get a new one before Christmas and they "attempted" to ship me another and hope it would arrive before Christmas without refunding me. I said yes, the replacement never came, and I gave the damaged one to my sister.

The bag itself also is a weird plastic with stretch like silicone so when you put items in it, the bag deforms to the item. It's meant for pocket change, but you can see the lines of each coin which makes the purse less cute.

Overall, received damaged item, was told I would receive a replacement which never came, and the purse isn't high enough quality anyways. Wouldn't purchase or recommend.
summary: Received damaged item, but even without damage is meh.

I also really love the racer back of it. I have tattoos, and it enables them to be seen, most shirts I get do not.  Unlike the pictures on the page, I would not be comfortable wearing this shirt with a pair of shorter shorts, because it is irregular hem, it does look like have no pants on from the back. I would actually mostly wear this shirt with a pair of skinny jeans or skinny capris.  It can be a little tight around the neck. If you don't like tighter things around your neck , this is not the shirt for you. I have found that pulling the back up and front a little down it loosens it a bit to make me happy.  I would say, if you like the color (exactly as it is in the picture)  and irregular hem shirts this is a great one to wear, casual enough to wear every day, but also easily able to be dressed up for a night on the town as well.

reviewText:
I purchased this for a friend undergoing chemo. I have a similar cap that I use for sleep and lounging and I love it. The cap is lined with the same fabric. Though the cap is lightweight and breathable it may get a little warm during the "flashes because it is layered. Like cotton, bamboo can wick moisture away from the skin and it is soft enough not to pull at the delicate hairs on the head. It is comfortable and flattering. I would recommend this product for oneself or gifting as it is impeccably packaged with the recipient in mind.

reviewText: Lovely little sleep cap. It is soft to the touch and very comfortable to wear. I got mine in the Pink Moon & Stars Print and it is very pretty. it is made from a soft blend of 95% bamboo viscose and 5% spandex. It provides total head coverage for women with hair loss. This cap has moisture wicking with natural antibacterial properties. (I actually do not have cancer) I have an average size head and it fits me fine. I ordered this because I suffer from the worst bed head ever. I look completely scary when I wake up in the morning. I have to take my son to school in the morning and I usually shower after I return home from my drop off. I ordered this because that way I can keep my hair somewhat in control, so it is easier to work with when I get up. Also, sometimes on the weekends I like to condition my hair for several hours. After I apply conditioner I put on a plastic cap, then put this over it and proceed with my normal chores. I am very happy to have received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

I like that it has a few slots to put your cards in and a pocket to fit items in and also a pocket with a zipper. It's also lightweight so it's not heavy even with items added to the wallet. Sometimes you get what you pay for.  These are cute pants onscreen, but very poor quality and I knew it the moment I opened their package.  The fit was somewhat awkward in the crotch seaming, and I should have returned.  But I wanted long yoga pants, so I tried to make them work.  I wore these pants exactly twice.  I wore them for exactly 2 hours both times (to run and then yoga class).  In between,  I hand washed and line dryed and they still have a runner from that seam area in the crotch.  I just hope that sucker wasn't there my last class.  I went out to the local athletic store and picked up a pair of Nike compression pants that even on sale are twice the amount that I paid for these, but guess what:  I've worn, washed and dried (in dryer) multiple time with no issue.  Quality does count and I shouldn't have let myself get suckered into wishful thinking by all those "genuine" sponsored reviews.  So don't do it, don't fall for the hype, these are cheap pants.
summary: DON'T believe all those sponsored reviews like I did.

I finally found a cap that I'm happy with. I have a 25 - 25 1/2 inch head, which is a US size 8 or XXXL. Needless to say, it's hard to find hats that fit right. Well, this thing is so stretchy I really think it can fit any head. It is certainly snug, but not uncomfortably so. And I assume it will form more to the size of my head the more I wear it.

The knitting seems very thick and durable. It's not overly soft, but then, I wasn't expecting it to be. I really like that it's VERY long. Long enough to cover your entire head if it's rolled out. I've had problems with hats like this being too short in the past and either slowly coming off my head or not covering my ears completely.

So far, I've only gotten to wear it outside when the temperature was about 35 F. It kept my head plenty warm and blocked the wind sufficiently. What i was really surprised about is that even wearing it inside for a while, my head didn't get uncomfortably hot or anything. Wool is a great temperature regulating material for a large range of temperatures. Now it may not be warm enough when the temperature drops super low, but then I bought it to use in combination with my jacket hood. But for what it is, it's a top notch, well made product for a reasonable price.

reviewText: I'm in love with this dress. I ordered from a different seller Zeagoo, here: Zeagoo Womens Casual Hollowed Back Strappy Sexy Sleeveless Party Maxi Dress, Large, Balck I didn't think I could pull it off being a women's size 12/14 with quite a bit of belly. I ordered a Large and it fit comfortably, not too tight with some room in the belly area! The bottom of the dress sort of flares out a bit like a mermaid tail, so that gives the dress a bit of elegance. The material is pretty thick, which is a test to the quality of this dress. The dress is already pretty revealing and it would be a shame if it looked cheap too. Well this dress does not look cheap! It makes me feel confident wearing it. It's super lightweight with just the right amount of cling but not too much where you would feel stuffed or that the dress is too tight (if you order your correct size of course). Sorry I didn't really upload pics of the front of the dress. It's pretty basic though, it's all about the back!! But the front is a regular tank top style, everything is covered. You can kind of see in the side body picture I uploaded. I was self conscious about my back fat/rolls so I ordered a strappy bralette to cover that particular area. So that's why you see straps going up my back. That's not part of the dress!!! The dress is cut out just like the model's in the display picture. This is what I ordered if you're interested: ToBeInStyle Women's Seamless Double Strap Bralette - Black - Medium/Large Would order again in another dark color, This dress is awesome!!! I received this dress at discounted price/for free in exchange for review.

reviewText:
I like the look of this bikini, however, the fit and feel of it was a bit uncomfortable for me. It may just be that I needed a smaller size, which for me, is hard to get down pat since I usually need a completely different size top than I do bottoms and purchasing the two together in a set often times becomes a problem. That being said, my main problem was just the way it sits on my body, if that makes any sense. The top fit okay, and there seems to be a decent amount of support if you have a larger chest. There is padding in it that almost lifts your breasts. The bottom, however, really feels like you are wearing a diaper. It's bulky and the entire suit has more weight to it than I would like. That's neoprene for you though. It just didn't fit me in the behind area very well and looked very unflattering. The color is nice, and I like the style, but I'm not sure I would be comfortable wearing this at the beach even if I weren't swimming.

reviewText: luv it

The pendant and chain arrived in a felt pouch which I will use to protect it from scratches when it is not being worn.  After taking it out of the pouch and holding it in my hand, I thought it would be too heavy on my neck and would bother me.  I don't usually wear something that large on my neck.  I also thought the choice of chain was too delicate to have a large pendant hanging from it.
Initially after putting it on, it did feel heavy as the pendant was seemingly pulling the chain tightly down upon my neck.  I went about my day, as I left the house to do some errands.  To my delight, I forgot I was even wearing it at all.  I attributed it to the fact that I don't usually wear thin chains at all.  After wearing it for a few days, I became used to it and I got a few compliments.  The one thing I was disappointed in was, I thought it would be a clear crystal piece all the way around, instead of the setting it was placed in.  However, it is still very pretty and I like the bail with crystals that surrounds the top of it and comes down on the side.
Pros: The chain is pretty, and I like the tiny smooth silver connectors placed intermittently within the chain itself.  The pendant is gorgeous and the facets casts some shimmering lights off it.
 Cons: The chain is too delicate and too short for a pendant this large.
Disclaimer:  I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for testing the product and giving my honest review.

Very pretty, has nice weight to it and the chain that came with it is far better that I thought it would be. The clasp is a traditional hook style and seems of average quality. I do like that it slides off without catching so I can switch the pendant easily if I want to use a shorter chain. This is absolutely gorgeous. The silver decoration is a great compliment to the diamonds coming from the pendant and makes the necklace look very elegant. The pendant stays flat and stands out, always catching the light and sparkling. The way the pendant is cut the light is able to catch it from so many different angles, grabbing attention most of the time. The pictures so not lie in this sellers post. This necklace shines and sparkles so much, it even sparkles when there really isn't a lot of light on. It comes with an 18 inch chain, so you can wear it as soon as you get it. The chain is delicate yet strong at the same time. I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

This necklace is absolutely without a doubt one of the prettiest necklaces I have ordered from Amazon.

The stone looks as if it is floating but is actually quite secure in the setting without blocking any light.

It would make a beautiful gift for your mother, daughter, significant other, grandmother, sister in law, or friend.

reviewText: I like it and they fit as expected. Delivered on time.

SUMMARY:  Exactly what I look for in boxers. Soft material, reinforced elastic, true to size and well made. No shrinkage or color fading through multiple washes. These are great boxers.

 SIZE, MATERIAL  & DESIGN: Right out of the package, these feel very soft. The hems are also soft and the inside hems are not abrasive.  The inside of the elastic band is not hemmed over with the same material as the boxers themselves, but is lined with what feels like a terrycloth-like fabric.  The elastic stretches to about double its size.  Because it is lined in the terrycloth, it seems like it is stronger and will last longer than non-reinforced elastic.

 USING THEM: I am a female, but often wear boxers for lounge-wear. They are true to size and fit exactly like I expected them to. They are soft and I cannot feel the hems  which is a huge deal because and I have sensitive skin, and often wear things inside out because of it.  I have been these them for three weeks and through several washings there is no fading or shrinking. They are comfortable and serviceable.

 NOTE: If you found this helpful, please click YES! I did receive this product in exchange for a review. BUT, I DO NOT lie or embellish. Im not the reviewer where, you stick a quarter in and a stellar review pops out. I give facts and I give opinions.  And both are 100% truth. Take it or leave it, but there it is. Hope my experience helps!
summary: Comfortable, true to size and soft material

Therefore, I must disclose that I was able to purchase this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review and please know that I never promise a positive review. I have no personal or financial interest in this company or anyone employed there.  I do my best to ensure that all my reviews are are fair, reasonably comprehensive, and that they do offer some value even though the product was purchased at a discount.  I do not want to be the "reviewer-who-can-not-be-trusted" and that is why all opinions are my own and are in no way compromised.  I really appreciate the chance to be able to test out this product!

I'm happy with the way it hugs my waist, but it really doesn't fit my chest whatsoever. I have roughly 1/2" to almost 3/4" of empty space in the cup. Even though they list 34B as being the largest cup size that'd fit in the Medium, I think you'd have to be a C or D cup to actually have it fit as intended (or possibly have a larger bust size). I marked it as 'Fit as Expected' only because it hugged my waist as intended and has a nice length. It's just the chest area that fit too loosely. The material of the shirt is nice and soft with a slight bit of stretch. It is not see through in any location even when stretched a bit with your hands. The padding of the bra feels nice and seems like it would be comfortable if it had actually fit well. Given that I was at the upper extreme for the suggested body size to fit a size M and it was was actually overly loose in the chest, I really can't suggest this shirt to anyone. It's a gamble as to if it will fit you properly or not given their suggested sizing. The side view picture that I'm attaching alludes to the large gap in the bra fitment. The shirt was sold to me at a discounted price in exchange for my review. I'm permitted to give a negative review if that's how I feel the product has performed.

I was thrown off by this. I would have liked the material itself to be thicker. It's very thin and almost more appropriate for sleeping. I ordered a large & have a full c cup but the bra size was wayyyyyyy smaller than I was expecting. My boobs were falling out of both the sides. There's only padding on the front. I got this for my wife since she loves these kinds of shirts and we were both disappointed. The middle of the cami has a deeper "V" then what the pictures show and unless you decide to wear another bra with this shirt or have ample size in the chest area it will be very loose. The material of the cami are good enough and look like they will hold up when washed but how the bra is attached leaves much to be desired. The fabric is soft and the color I choose for my wife was black and it is a nice shade of black.

The best I could say to do would be to possibly get a size down from your normal size if lacking in the size department or as stated earlier wear a bra with the shirt. Also the shirt seemed to be a tad bit short compared to the picture as well. Might be something to consider if yo are a taller lady. I hate to keep coming back to this and stressing it but please really consider buying this if you think you will not be able to fill the shirt in, it will be a major headache for you if the size is too big.

I'm giving this cami an overall 3 star rating because of how the "V" in the middle of the cami is deeper than the images show and because of the included padded bra being more of a hindrance then an enhancer. I think if the padded bra size could also be chosen or even toned down a bit it would be better overall.

reviewText: Very cute suit. I bought a XL and I usually wear 10/12 USA. It did run small as they said.

The material used to make this camisole is mainly Modal. The tag is in an Asian language, so I cannot be sure, but it says 90% and 10% of something; I am assuming that the 90% is Modal. I didn't know what Modal is, so I looked it up. It is a type of Rayon made from the fibers of a Beech tree. It is not a totally natural fiber because the pulp from the tree is processed using chemicals. It is cool to the touch, wicks away moisture, very absorbent and less likely to pill than cotton. The fabric is nice; soft and smooth. It is not too thin; it can be worn without a bra underneath. At the same time, it is not too thick, it will be cool to wear in the summer heat.

I am 5 8 tall weigh 125 and wear a 34B. Using the size chart, I chose to order a size large. The padded cup is about the right size on me. After adjusting the straps, it fit pretty well. The body of it fits a bit loose, perhaps a Medium would have fit better. The only time that I had an issue with the cups slipping was when I laid down while wearing it. I think if it were just a little tighter, I would not have a problem at all. In color, I chose to order purple. It is a very nice light basic shade; not overly vibrant. It will be easy to match it to many items in my wardrobe.

Overall, I like this camisole; I think that I look attractive while wearing it. It certainly helps my figure to look better. It appears to me to be well made; the stitching is straight, even and solid. I would recommend this product to women with a smaller bust size. I don't think it would fit right on women who wear a B cup or smaller.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my HONEST and UNBIASED opinion.
summary: Great cami -  but not for large busted women

So I love this coat.  I do not like coats that are to tight and make it hard to wear layers with them.  I am 5' 4" and 118 lbs and the small was very comfortable.  I had plenty of room in it to wear two layers of clothing under it and still be able to breathe and zip it up and have a bit of room.  So I was very happy with the look at fit of the coat.  I gave it a 2 because of the smell.  I can't wear this coat because of how strong the faux leather smell is.  It smelled up my whole living room and kitchen as soon as I took it out of the box.  I looked online to try to find ways to reduce the smell.  I wiped vinegar on it 4 times and let it dry.  I tried putting it in a container with baking soda.  I tried washing it.  Nothing seems to get rid of this smell.  It makes me embarrassed to wear it anywhere because of just how strong it smells.  So while I love this coat...I don't really wear it as much as I want because of the smell.  If I'm going to be around a lot of people, I just can't wear it cause its over powering.  I really hope after wearing it some it will tame the smell...but so far it has not.

UPDATE:  As I stated above, I do not wear this coat often because of the smell.  I went to wear it today and noticed that after 3 times of wearing it the lining the in the pocket already had a whole in it and the seam for the lining of the arm already has a hole it in.  Very upset to see this thing is falling apart already after very minimal use.
summary: Great coat EXCEPT for the epicly strong smell...

My hope is that sharing my opinion, perspective, and actual experiences with products I use in my everyday life can greatly benefit others as they make their own purchasing decisions. There have been so many purchases I have made that I should have checked reviews for first because disappointedly, I discovered the hard way that it didn't live up to expectations or advertisements. Now as a consumer, I always look to the reviews and reflect on what is said. Especially for larger purchases. It is so rewarding to find great products that live up to expectations and advertisements.
I did receive this item free to try out and give my honest and unbiased opinion.

The reason I decided to purchase these bow ties is because our son said he wants to wear bow ties, not neck ties, when we have to go to dressier places.  He has clip on ties and finds them very annoying.  To add to it, when he got to school this year, one of his teachers stated that he wears a bow tie every Monday to help him get over the "Monday blues."  Now my son wants to wear one every Monday too.  These are absolutely adorable.  They are large enough for a man, but they are cute with the texture/pattern so I'm not overly sure that a man would appreciate them as much as a young boy.  They came individually wrapped.  The colors are muted and the material is silky.  There is ample room in the adjustable neck to fit a larger man and they adjust to a size small enough to fit my son's neck too.  He loves these.  And quite frankly, any day my kid decides to wear something nicer than jeans, a t'shirt, and a sweatshirt to school is a good dressed up day.  I got these six adjustable bow ties for free or at a substantial discount.  I do not get reimbursed or compensated for writing a better or worse product review.
summary: Dressy....but not sure a man would appreciate the pattern

reviewText:
I have been in the market for a new purse. I have ordered some online and had to return because they were too small, too rigid, and just not right. I felt like I was Goldilocks looking for the "ultimate" purse.

When I received the purse, it did give off a plasticy smell for about a day or so. It quickly dissipated. The more I use the bag, the more "worn in" it gets. This doesn't mean that the purse is being damaged, it is just getting softer. Similar to when you purchase a genuine leather bag and it softens after a while.

The color is very close to the image you see on your computer monitor. Disclaimer: it may not match exactly to the color on your computer screen as each monitor is different based on the factory or personal settings. This purse has two compartments in addition to a zippered middle. The exterior zipper has 2 zipper pulls. You can choose which side you want the zipper to stop or even in the middle if you like!

I have received numerous compliments on this purse and I am loving it more because of the amount I paid for it. I don't think I've ever made a better online purchase than this one. And I shop a lot online!

If this review has been helpful, please click YES. If I've left anything out, please feel free to ask questions. I rely on reviews, videos and photos when making my decision to buy a product online, and I would like to know if my reviews HELPFUL to you. I would also like to know if I need to add anything. I take pride in offering descriptive reviews and honest feedback.

A little about me: I have been an Amazon Prime customer for quite a while and I really enjoy writing reviews  I love shopping actually, and love sharing my finds. I received this product on a promotional discount from seller for exchange of my honest unbiased review. I am not associated with the seller in any way. I don't receive any remuneration, nor am I required to give a good review. The discount I get does not influence my feedback or review.

My personal criteria for products:

 1 star (I do not like this item or product). I feel it's a waste of money. Would never use it again. Would not recommend. Either throw it away or return it.

 2 stars (Not a big fan): Would not purchase again nor share it with my friends, but may still have at least 1 positive thing about it.

 3 stars (Its Fair): Product has both positives and negatives, and I may or may not continue using it. It might be a better item for another person. If I think of who may like it better I will likely write about who I think it would work for.

 4 stars (Pretty good in my book!): Item is accurately described. May have 1 or 2 things I might potentially change, but not a deal breaker. Would recommend it to friends and family.

 5 star (It is perfect and I LOVE it!) Practically perfect. Amazing quality and a must have. It means I would not only recommend, but would purchase for others and continue to purchase for myself.

I was able to receive this product at a discount for my honest review and I would recommend this to anyone else.

I order something from Amazon almost every week, and I am never inclined to write a review-- regardless of whether I love or hate something; but I had to share my thoughts on this purchase. I chose this top on a whim, looking for something flattering but comfortable to wear with skinny jeans or leggings. I've had bad luck with tunics in the past-- too shapeless; but the cut of this one looked promising. And good news-- it's every bit as flattering as the model pic suggests. For reference, I'm 5'5" about 148ish, size 8-10; and I ordered a large in black. Perfect fit-- body-skimming up top, looser from the rib cage down, but not bag-like. The best part is the sleeve length-- sometimes the three-quarter cut makes me look sorta T-Rex-like, but this length is just right. Dainty even.

I really like the weight and quality. It's definitely not chintzy-thin. It's a decent quality material that just so happens to not be thick. The blue color is fantastic and gives it a semi-pricey feel. Good buy!

reviewText: Love this bag!
it is a very nice looking purse, but was much larger than i had visualized, so i returned it.

I read the only three reviews this bag has and they were all saying it's nice quality and was expecting that. If it is real lamb skin, then it must only be a small percentage of the bag, like the zipper handle or something. The quilted part wrinkled when I put it down and hasn't returned to its original supple form, which is one of the traits real lambskin leather is suppose to have. When you press on one of the quilt squares it has a similar feeling to pushing your fingers through the plastic produce bags in grocery stores, definitely not rubbery like they said in a leather article. The zippers feel incredibly cheap and they get stuck and after zipping it closed the zipper chain opens again. Same with the inside zipper. The inside lining feels flimsy and moves all over the place. I have a bag similar in design but smaller and a lot cheaper and was expecting the SUSU bag to be a lot better quality than my Christian Lacroix bag, but this felt like it's only worth $5. I'm assuming the gold metal on the bag is paint since it was already chipped. I'm clumsy so after a month of using this bag, it would probably look like garbage. I haven't used it at all but I can tell it would not last long in anyone's hands.
summary: Deserves only 1 star, but gave it 2 because I like the design and size...

reviewText: Gorgeus bag, beautifully made. Great with dressy ensemble.  Only thing I would have liked more is if the strap would have been a complete chain, with leather running through the links and maybe a detachable tassel. I chose this bag because: 1. chic shape, 2. size,( I can grab my wallet and throw it in rather than having to remove things if changing purses from my daytime tote to an evening look)  3. it has a zipper rather than a flap with a buckle/clasp like some others I saw and liked. This SUSU style allows wearer to stand at a party or reception and open bag with one hand, and nothing falls out. . The flap type with a chain or strap running through the top of the flap instead of having grommets or other attachment on side of purse panel like this purse has leaves a gap where small items can fall out (pens, lipsticks) if purse is tilted while closed,  and requires two hands to open and get something out. Not a good thing if one is standing holding a plate or drink at reception/intermission time or do not have a table to set the purse on while opening.  So, I am thrilled with this purchase - it works on many levels!!!
summary: buy it! wonderful! can't beat the price if you want real lambskin leather.

The way the straps, the bodice, and the back are sewn make this a very supportive fit.  This feels like a dress that won't fall apart, it's sturdy and I can see it lasting for years. Im curvy with a tummy that you wouldn't be able to see if I would have bought my actual size. And you can't wear a shaper to correct it for obvious reasons. Luckily for me I am actively losing weight so it will be my "daaaang you got hot" dress. Just keep in mind that the fabric feels amazing but is not forgiving. reviewText:
These socks are so cute.  I really like how they look when you scrunch them up around the ankles.  They have a very old fashioned appeal to them and are quite feminine looking.  They look pretty cute pulled up too, but I especially like them scrunched up.  While they are not as soft as I hoped they would be, they are not stiff either.  They are thin enough to breath so your feet won't sweat in them, but thick enough not to wear out easily.  The seams are sewn well and there are no rough edges that rub into your toes or feet. I wish the material was a little softer though.  For some reason they look like they would be super soft, like microfiber soft, but they really aren't.  They feel more like control type pantyhose material, only thicker.  They are still quite comfortable and they are so cute that I don't mind too much, but still....softer is always nice.  As far as looks go, they are adorable and I love the vintage style and colors.
I received these Dr. Anison Women Vintage Look Socks at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. I do not guarantee a good review. I rely on product reviews myself when shopping and will always give my honest opinion-good or bad. All opinions are based on my experience with the product and yours may differ.

It is quite heavy and very well made, it has a solid body design and will not smash the items on the inside. It has a gold satin material inside the clutch, and the top snaps shut tightly to keep it closed. it comes with two different size chain straps, one long and one short, but the are both removable if you want to just use the little handle that is attached to it(also covered in larger rhinestones).This clutch is perfect for a dressed up outfit, or even with a pair of jeans and heels. great for any age group, a very classic design The only issue I have is that the small handle was not attached to the purse, but did come with the screws, but they are to small for the holes so I have to find some more screws to fit it. It also comes with a few extra rhinestones in case you loose a few. I did receive this at a discount in exchange for my review, but the opinions are totally my own.

It was hard to see at first since it is black material and black thread but there are areas that the sewing machine operator sewed outside the correct area and then just re-sewed over it to make it work and still left the mistake instead of fixing it first. This review is for the Foryingni Women's Plus Size Cutout Foil Print Bodycon Dress.

This classic, tight fitting Bodycon dress is simply stunning! When I first saw it on Amazon, I thought the top with the design was metal studs. When I received it  I was surprised to find out it was just printing on the fabric, hence, the title says: Foil print and not studding. It was my mistake but I have to say that it is BEAUTIFUL and highly detailed!

I ordered the size XL  I am a size 12-14. This fits PERFECTLY!!!!! That means this seller makes their garments in United States sizing. This also comes in 3 different colors  I got the black. It is VERY jet black and the silver print on the neckline is really noticeable. The silver is not super shiny  it is more a matte silver. But honestly I think it would have been too much with the shiny silver and it looks perfect the way it is!

The dress comes down past my knees  this makes it appropriate for work if you wear a cardigan and pantyhose with it. I put a black cardigan with it because it is short sleeved anyways, and it looks so cute. The back of this dress also has a zipper, but the fabric is super stretchy so I just pull it over my head and smooth it down, it works fine. Also the sleeves come to the perfect length and are not just capped but a little longer. The neckline has that nice cutout that gives it a sexy bit of flare. I have washed this in cold water in a garment bag and hung it dry and it turns out beautiful. It also doesnt need ironing which makes it perfect for travel. I LOVEEEE this dress and I think you will too! 5/5 stars

If you have any questions please post below and I would be happy to answer! I received a free promotional sample of this item for my honest and unbiased review.

The skirt was not the color it appears in the photos. Instead of being mint green it's beige, and the butterflies are more vibrant blues and purples than what is shown. It's a lovely skirt, it just doesn't look like what's pictured. Most of my disappointment comes from the fact that I already own a dress in the same beige color, made of the same material, with the same butterfly pattern. This was not apparent from the photos and now I have two of the same thing. The size is also a bit odd. The description said it should fit a 55 cm to 98 cm waistline; I measured my waist at 74 cm and yet the skirt squeezes my waist and gives me a bit of a muffin top. I don't feel like what I got was worth what they're charging for, especially considering the dress I have with the same pattern cost me about half the price as this one.

It's simple physics. If you're not careful, you can end up ratcheting this belt to the point where there's not enough slack to allow the pawl to release. At that point - as you try to find a little "give" in the thing - it just gets tighter and tighter - to the point that you have to find something sharp, like scissors or a utility knife to cut yourself out (ruining the belt, of course). This has happened to me twice - so now I understand why the leather belt is sold separately. It's a nice looking belt. But be very aware of this problem when putting it on.
summary: Know Where Your Utility Knives Are

reviewText: Nice simple wallet.

I absolutely love these little wallets!!!  I think it's the best wallet in the whole world!  It's lightweight, has a low profile and is just what I need.  To illustrate just how much I love these, I carry it in my pocket everyday (I'm not a purse kind of girl, so I need something small to hold my money, ID & cards).  I have had this type of wallet for years (the one I had before was the exact same, except it had a different pattern instead of the snowfllakes) and purchased this one after my 60lbs dog (who likes to chew) found it in the driveway (after it accidentally fell out of my pocket) and proceeded to chew it up and destroy the contents.  I came out the next morning to find everything strewn all over the front yard!  (I had to tape cash back together and get new credit/bank cards -- she even chewed my driver's license in 3 pieces.  I had an interesting time explaining that to the guy at the DMV)  :)  The wallet itself (surprisingly) did not have too much damage, as the zipper had been chewed off and there was a slight hole in one of the corners.  This just goes to show how strong the wallet really is!  <><
summary: This really is the Best Wallet in the World!!

reviewText: I love these glasses and the case is a gr8 plus !!!

These readers a good value at ~$10, but I wouldn't spend much more for them.  They have decent lenses, and are flexible, but have also bent out of shape a bit, so probably aren't really quality memory metal.  In addition, the hinges are very tight, making them difficult to open and close without flexing the frame, so the likelihood of them keeping their shape over time (and not breaking) is pretty low.  But they work for now and the price is great.

The case is nicely made, but a bit too small for the glasses, so it's sometimes hard to stuff them in and get the case closed.  Again, fine for the price, but I'm glad I didn't spend any more on this product.

Edit 9/1/16:  These held up pretty well for a couple of months before a lens popped out and got lost while I was mowing the lawn.  The frame is actually still in good shape, which I can't say for my many other pairs of readers, including flexies and Magnavisions, that lasted no longer than these. If I ever find the lens again (not likely given my yard is 4 acres) I'd be able to pop the lens back in and they'd probably last a few more months. Given the price, I'm going to buy another pair..

My willingness to buy these again will depend on how long they last.

reviewText: To wide for nose

First off I did want to mention that I do not see how you can use this as a nose piercing unless you use it for a septum piercing. It is good enough to use for a lip piercing but you will more than likely have to get the biggest size for it to work. For your ears, cartilage piercings you will need the medium-small sizing depending on how big your ears are. Since my ear is on the smaller size I need the smallest size for my ear. And my lips are fuller I need the biggest size for my lip. It is best to measure or go by what you own instead of guessing which might work for you. Since the little gems are screw on it is a bit hard to screw on. I used this for a few days with no issues, no irritation and works great for what I needed.

I received this swimsuit for free to test and review.

Note to all. This is not a suit for wearing if you are going to be swimming laps, surfing, water skiing, or any thing other than wading in. The bottom is tied on and the ties are not secure enough to keep it on if there is external pressure of the water against them. You will lose the bottom and possibly even the top.

The bottom is a small one. It is meant for smaller behinds, so if you have a bubble bottom, don't try this. It will not fit properly for full rear coverage. Think ultra low rise jeans.

The top is made so that it cradles breasts, but if you size it incorrectly, you will pop out of the cups. Think push up bra style. This will fit under a c-cup, but be cautious if you are over that. Just as with bras, not every style or model will fit every body. Properly sized, this adds a bit of cleavage without having half of the breast sitting on a shelf, just waiting to pop out if you decide to play volleyball. (On second thought, unless it is a racy game of volley ball, don't play in this suit unless you are an a/b cup.)

The material is soft and the suit is well made. There are no loose threads or obvious missed stitches. It should hold together great for at least this season's summer.

It arrived in a PVC bag that left the smell all through this suit. I had to wash it four times in lingerie detergent to get the odor out. There is no way I could even try it on before doing this, the smell was burning my nose. While the bag seems like a good idea, I won't buy or review another suit by Raintropical because of it. I am very sensitive to odors and I don't like having to wash something several times to remove strong odors.

reviewText:
Actually not a bad mouse pad. Nothing fancy, but seems well made.

The color is off a bit, just as some other reviews have mentioned. I ordered the moon print, and the grey has slightly purple cast to it. In bright light it was noticeable, but not obvious if you weren't looking for it. In dimmer light (such as my home office), the pad looks grey.

Dimensions match the listing, for good and ill. By that I mean, you're getting what's described, but the product would be *much* better if it were slightly larger, at least for my purposes.

Neither gripe is worth docking a star, so I'm giving this mouse pad 4 stars -- better than average, and as described. I reserve five stars for exceptional items. For what it's worth, I intend to order another as a backup, and possibly a third for my son, who liked it as well.

UPDATE:
I ordered another necklace from this company (directly -- not thru Amazon) with assurances that my necklace would arrive in perfect condition. I am happy to report that it looked like the photos, without any defects: A beautiful bold blue statement necklace! So, I have decided to add another star to my review. However, my prior experience as noted below is a factual account of what actually happened to me, so I do not believe that it would be honest to delete this history or to change my initial review.

UPDATE:
The RUILONG company contacted me and gave me a 37% refund on my purchase because of the defective stone in the fuchsia necklace that I decided to keep. The company has also assured me that if I purchase another necklace, the stones will not have any defects and will look as perfect as they do in the posted photos. I have added one star to my rating, due to excellent customer service. However, if I receive another defective necklace, I will update my review once more to accurately describe my experience.
*******************

Overall (without looking too closely) I really love this necklace. The stones are large and all of them are a bit different, making for a unique and striking statement necklace. The fuchsia color is bright and each stone varies in tonality.

However, the big problem with this necklace is poor quality control. I had to order the fuchsia necklace 4 times before I received a necklace that did not have a major problem due to chips, large craters, and gaps in the thread because the stone was too small to fill the space. After the 4th order, I decided to keep the best of the 4 necklaces, which had a damaged stone close to the neck connector, which I decided to overlook because I don't think that it will be readily seen due to it's position.

I also ordered the orange necklace, which had no problems due to damaged stones. However, the coloring of the stones was not a vibrant orange, as the photo shows. The "orange" coloring has a much more muted brownish tint. It's a nice color, just not the bright orange that I wanted. So, I ended up returning this necklace as well.

Without any quality control issues, this necklace would be worthy of 5 stars. But because of all the problems that I had in getting an undamaged necklace (and I still don't have a perfect one!)  I believe that it currently deserves just 2 stars. Too bad...because if these necklaces did not have quality control issues, they would be worthy of 5 stars!
summary: Poor Quality Control Ruins A Beautiful Statement Necklace

While they looked like a deep pink online, in real life the stones are a light pink and kind of dull, unlike the other stones. The presence of these light stones makes it look like it is made for someone  much younger. The stones are also not in a setting, they are glued on the ring so they are likely to fall off.

With this all being said, I think the ring would be nice for a young  girl or woman. I don't necessarily dislike it, it is just not for me. The ring itself seems well made and sturdy, even if the stones don't look terribly secure.

I absolutely love these sunglasses. They were shipped quickly to me, and the packaging was very nice to keep them from breaking during delivery. From the moment I opened the box I could tell these were not cheaply made sunglasses. They come with both soft and hard carrying cases, and also a cleaning rag and screw driver. I ordered the marble frames and I have had so many compliments on these frames. I have found in other sunglasses I have purchased over the years that some look better on me with my hair down vs my hair up. These frames look great either way which I love! I really like how dark the lenses are. I have a hard time finding good sunglasses with dark lenses to block out the sun while driving and these are now my go-to sunglasses. They are very comfortable to wear. I like how well made they are and how sturdy they are. I have two toddlers and they are very rough with things and these sunglasses have taken a beating and they are still in perfect shape. I am very impressed with the quality. The only thing I wasn't a fan of was these are a bit larger than I typically wear so it took some getting used to.

reviewText: I was looking for a well-made, but reasonably priced, pair of light weight denim slim fitting jeans. My last pair gave up the ghost after years of wear, having served solid duty when I was 2 sizes larger than I am now -- they were some inexpensive pull on jean from WalMart (side note: I don't shop there anymore, boycotting Waltons' companies). These ARE the jeans I was looking for! I decided that the price was right, but I wasn't sure about sizing, so I got one pair each, in Small and Medium. The Small fits suitably snug, but not cuts-off-circulation /overstuffed-sausage / look-at-that-old-lady-in-skintight-jeans snug. I *may* keep the Medium, for those days when I want to wear a pair of jeans that skim-while-slim. Haven't decided. But, I will DEFINITELY look for the same jeans, in a different color soon. Overall, I am very pleased with the fit; quality of workmanship; denim color and details (the "frayed" hem); and sale price. The jeans are the perfect pairing with tunic tops and my longer tees and tanks--and the fabric is a comfortable weight for even our 100-degree days here in Florida. Though I am petite (5'3", 118#), the length works with both flats and heels. Saferin Women's Denim Shaping Curvy Fit Jeans Legging Blue M
Nice for a curvy hip girl!! I bought the medium which is true to size but I'm also going to purchase another size up for those lounging days ;)
summary: Nice for a curvy hip girl

Love this Singlelady Lace Babydoll. I am 5'10, wear a size 8, 36D chest.  I was offered this item free for my objective review and evaluation and I ordered this in USL/Tag XL. I love how it fits.

The material is sheer and therefore is see-through. There are pretty rhinestones on the chest portion. The lace pattern is lovely and the stitching is nicely done. The straps are adjustable to allow for the wearer to adjust the fit which is very nice. I felt that there was good support in the chest for my size. The panties that come with the babydoll are a g-string --- essentially just straps of material. The underwear is not what I would call comfortable, but not sure any g-string is comfortable for prolonged wear.

I am amazed at how nicely this fits and how well it is constructed for the price. Would definitely recommend!
summary: Great fit, pretty, and nicely made

reviewText: I will admit, I love a nice pair of flannel pajamas or a pair of boxer shorts and a tshirt to wear to bed. However, its nice to liven things up a bit with a cute lingerie set and this definitely fits the bill. As you can see in my short video, this comes not only with the short little baby doll dress but also with a pair of matching panties as well. What I really like about this is that although it is semi-sheer, it still does leave some things to the imagination. Nothing is hanging out in the front or from behind either. There is ample coverage all around while still looking cute. There is a decorative tie in front for a bow and the shoulder straps are adjustable for different sized frames. It is well sewn with no loose strings, frayed edges or busted out seams. If you're in the market for a lingerie set that leaves some things to the imagination while looking adorable at the same time, this would be a great choice! I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Still leaves some things to the imagination!

reviewText: The material is polyester, which I hadn't realized when I ordered.  I would have lived with my mistake if not for the fact that this particular material has a very unpleasant, almost sticky feel to it.  In addition, the sleeves are made for pencil-thin arms, which few people have.

I am a huge Allegra K fan! I have oodles of pieces from this collection. I took a risk on this piece based on my overwhelmingly positive prior experiences. Every ships very quickly and is always constructed of good quality materials, that hold their shape, color and integrity.
However, with *this specific* peice I am a bit disappointed. The colors are true, the materials is great (not see through), and the construction on the shirt is great except for the cut. I hace a petite structure with a very endowed chest so I knew this might be an issue. And fully intended to just have the shirt tailored a bit to get a custom fit. What I didn't expect was the enormous arm hole and overly extended shoulder area. This combination creates. Situation where the shirt sits oddly across your back, think almost of a cowl but on your back and with a collared shirt. And when you extend your arms straight out or lift them up the shirt lifts well above your belly button.
It's a bummer!
However, with all that said, I still really love the fabric and color so I am going to take it to my seamstress and see what magic she can work on it. I will either have it tailored so I can wear as it is meant to be worn (long sleeved button down, ideally) or I will ask her to convert it into a sleeveless button down for warmer weather.
I will update my review after its been tailored, I am still holding out hope.
I hope my review doesn't deter anyone away from the brand and collections because I do love all of my other peices- from dresses to sweaters to pullovers and short-sleeved tops I wear at least one an Allegra K peice basically weekly.

I love Allegra as it seems to fit me to a T.  This piece is no exception.  The only complaint I have for this item is that it came pretty wrinkled - just a nuisance that I had to dig out my iron to iron the shirt before I can wear it.  Otherwise, it is a lovely purchase.

Overall the quality is okay. I wouldn't expect anything better for the price. My biggest complaint with it is that the elastic area kinda looks cheap. It is 1 inch elastic and covered by a shiny material. This also affects how its fits. I'm about a size 6/8 and very tall, and it makes me look pretty fat. I ordered this in both black and red, and the black certainly looks better (probably just because black is slimming) I also have a very hourglass figure and wear this at the skinnies part of my waist. I would only wear it with a very tight shirt, otherwise I makes me look closer to a size 16 or bigger. I think it would look significantly better with a thick (2-2.5 inch) ribbon tied around the elastic, which I plan to do in the future.

If it is something that you only want to wear once or you are very skinny and tall (size 0/2 and 5'*8"+) I would recommend it. Otherwise I would look for a different one and spend a little more money on something that is slightly more flattering.

This tote bag has been very useful in the couple of months I've had it. It folds into a fairly small size, with the handles making it easy to carry. I use it almost daily, when collecting the mail or packages, or just if I have a number of things to carry. It's very useful as a place to keep things like a winter hat, gloves, scarf, earmuffs, etc., when I go to a restaurant, to a movie, etc., because there's never enough room in my pockets and purse for all those things. The tote is fairly strong, and I've also used it for carrying groceries, books, and miscellaneous things when I want to keep my hands free. I usually use it in addition to a purse or fanny pack, though it would probably work well to throw a wallet and a few other things in there, and use it without a handbag. The price seemed very reasonable. Occasionally the zipper does something weird, and comes open at the wrong end, but it hasn't stuck yet, and I can always unzip or re-zip it again to make the zipper work again. I've never had anything fall out. It's usually when I try to put something too large in it, so it's more of a user error than a manufacturing issue. I would recommend it to anyone looking for an inexpensive, functional, foldable tote.

You know I spent a couple of hours reading reviews and looking for a hat or visor that would give me the best sun protection. I had just recently spent $30+ on a San Diego Company hat and didn't cover me nearly as much, so here I am now much happier with this $11 hat. I read in a review that this hat doesn't fit good if you have a small head, I disagree that it has anything to do with how it fits but more on the style, because I have a small head and it fits me just fine. reviewText:
I'm always skeptical about ordering dresses online, especially when they come from overseas. But I can say that I am pleasantly surprised and quite satisfied with this dress. First off, the dress looks exactly as it is pictured. Its not a cheap knock off and the material is light yet sturdy. The dress is well made and perfectly proportionate. A lot of times when I see dresses that flare at the bottom in pictures it is flat on arrival but this dress flares at the bottom just like it is pictured. The sizing is perfect. It hugs my curves and I felt great when I tried it on. It took a while to get the dress (a few weeks) but it came from overseas so that's to be expected. Overall, I'm totally satisfied with this dress. I am in love with this style dress and I was not the least bit disappointed.

The material will soften up as you wash it and wear it. Out of the package it was a little stiff and scratchy but nothing that bothered my skin. I don't have sensitive skin though. I hand wash it and line dry it. I don't think it would do well in the washer. I cut and burn any pulls or straggle threads which does happen with this scarf.

While I did get this Ysiop Women Gradient Scarf Tassel Sunscreen Shawl Beach Wrap with Gift Bag for free or at a discount, I always leave an honest review. I have seen many people saying that reviewers who get the product for free or at a discount can't leave an honest review. Have you seen my reviews? If I am disappointed by a product I say that . I leave fewer stars, and I tell you what is wrong with something if there is something wrong. I pull no punches. And you should know that on every product it tells you that you must leave an honest review. I feel no obligation to anyone to leave a good review if the product does not deserve it. But if I love a product I am not going to say anything less either. I feel my obligation is, to tell the truth about every product whether I receive a discount or not. 'I am not affiliated with the seller, supplier, or manufacturer in any way. This is my honest review. I am not compensated for my reviews. I hope this helps you to understand how the process works.

reviewText: I like the idea behind this belt. However, although it is stylish in its minimalism it is very impractical with regards to function. Despite the Grip6 marketing material that this belt "holds tight all day", that was not at all my experience upon first wearing this belt. I was constantly tightening it on pants where traditional belts have always been less fussy and largely forgotten. If you are looking for a belt that serves its intended purpose - to hold your pants in place - then move on. I'd much rather wear a traditional belt that is both stylish and practical. If your pants are tailored to fit you perfectly and you are looking for a belt that provides form over function, then this might be the belt for you. That said, I would NEVER wear this with a suit for business purposes (as some reviewers have commented) as it is far too casual in appearance (which you could gather from the pictures). My intended purpose was for casual wear. However, I'd much rather wear a D-ring belt for casual wear or a versatile, traditional belt. Overall I would not purchase this again, nor would I recommend it, especially considering the price point and the many shortfalls that come with the Grip6 belt.

reviewText:

This belt not only is the best looking belt I have ever seen, but it is also the most comfortable. Easy to use with no fuss. Also, if your life is ever in danger and you need something to hold on to while you cross a great distance via zip line cable thing, this belt is perfect! I think it can support well over what any person weighs.

Want a belt that looks awesome, feels awesome, and could potentially save your life under the right circumstances? Well, here you go. Enjoy.

I've been trying to find a good belt for a while now. Not just a belt that works; I wanted something a bit different. I saw the Grip6 elsewhere on the web and was immediately interested, so I went ahead and bought the Blue Steel one on Amazon to try it out.

I'm hooked. These belts really are great. They're a bit more involved to get on than a standard belt, but you can adjust them much more minutely and it stays in place all day for me. It's very comfortable too. I unfortunately have a small beer gut from my younger days, so sometimes belt buckles can dig into my belly and cause some discomfort. Not with the Grip6, it's slim and very comfortable.

I think they look pretty great, too. If you're willing to give the Grip6 belt a shot, I think most people would be pleasantly surprised.

Awesome belt!  I don't even feel like i'm wearing a belt, but also don't have the issue with my pants not fitting.  Now with no holes I can adjust it to be slightly tighter or looser accordingly.  I generally get a slightly larger waist size than my waist, hence the need for a belt.  I also like to carry keys on an external clip, and with the overall size of the belt, my older clips felt like they would slide off, but held on securely on my older belts, which I ended up replacing almost every year since they wore out and the holes began to spread out and feel less secure.  Fixed that with a clip that slips on from the end of the belt and is held on by both the top and bottom, that clip will not come off at all.

reviewText:
These are truly the last pair of sunglasses you will ever need. Not only does it block out unwanted light doing the day, but it also functions as night goggles amplifying ambient light at night so you can where them all the time! These sunglasses will change your life... literally! As soon as I received this product, I put it on and took a look in the mirror. I was stunned to find that my face had morphed into Chris Hemsworth's! Now I'm constantly being invited to Hollywood exclusive parties and banging all the tightest poon in LA. Not only that but yesterday morning I was hit by a car, and as I laid on the street dying my sunglasses allowed me to peer into God's very soul. I was told the impending date of the Apocalypse and Lady Gaga's true gender (not telling, that's for me and my glasses to know). Thankfully my glasses are integrated with Life Alert and I was resuscitated quickly by the most caring of medical staff.

Overall, they are a bit pricey, but the money I've saved on booze at the bar and club entrance fees have already paid it off. These sunglasses are pretty much perfect, I only gave it 4 stars because Tifosi is a stupid name.
summary: These sunglasses are pretty much perfect

reviewText: My daughter loves them
Fit as expected .. But one shoe doesn't hold a charge for longer than an hour or two. The other shoe works fine.

My son loves these shoes and they are awesome! The lights are very bright and we've had fun changing the colors as well as how the light is shown (flashing, constant, etc). They are very comfortable for him and breathable which is great for summer. When I took out the insoles I noticed the stitching holding the fabric to the sole of the shoe didn't seem to be of the best quality so I'm not sure how durable these are. For shoes that are less than $30 if they last through summer I will feel as if I have received a good return on the purchase. Although I would say the joy that these brought my son is priceless, and we have received compliments everywhere we have gone on how cool they are. These are way better than your standard light up shoes that come with those built in red lights. I'm impressed and happy after 1 week, they fit well.

I'm not crazy about light-up shoes, as they tend to look cheesy and bulky.  But kids love them, so I feel these were a good compromise. They look decent, are easy to put on (no laces), seems comfortable, and have multiple lighting options (on/off, interganging colors, solid color, blinking color). The choices are endless; fully customizable to fit style/personality/day. Each shoe can be controlled on its own! These shoes have quite a bright light that remains on (unlike most light-up shoes that only light while stepping) until turned off.

The mini USB charge port is located in a discrete pocket on the inside part of the shoe, within the strap. I've seen similar shoes here on Amazon with a huge black velcro pocket that didn't look esthetically  appealing. I've included pics from right out the box!

I ordered with Prime and received in 2 days! So no shipping from China and having to wait 4 weeks. As for price, at $36 I would say is quite fair. Cheap Walmart/Payless shoes run at least $25 easy.

My son is soon to be 5 and wears shoe size US11.5/12. I ordered the US12 in Navy, and they fit perfectly right out of the box. I usually prefer to buys shoes a 1/2 size bigger for more wiggle room and room to grow, but since these shoes don't have laces to tighten, larger is not quite ideal.

My son loves them, so I was glad to please his desire for light-up shoes. I've even seen similar style shoes for adults so even the bigger kids can still have light-up shoes.

Let's see how the hold up. Will update as necessary. But for now, I would give a thumbs up for sure.

I purchased these and paid for rush delivery so that my son could wear them for the fourth of July Celebration. They arrived charged and ready to go. He wore them all day the first day with no problem. He loves these shoes! He gets compliments everywhere he goes. The next night, at the fireworks celebration, the left shoe just stopped working, an hour before show. Very frustrating. The following day, I charged only the left shoe. After 3 hours, it lit up perfectly. Two hours later, it stopped working. I decided that this was just a defect, returned them, and I ordered a second pair of the exact same shoes. This time, the right shoe would change settings as my son walked on it. Like the pressure affected the wiring. That didn't bother me so much. It kind of looked cool, but he couldn't control the setting which is part of the fun. Then, the next day the red lights just stopped working, never turned on again. Finally, he was left with only green and blue working on one shoe. That still wasn't a deal breaker for me, until a week after receiving the shoes, the defective one stopped holding a  charge. This is a great idea and both kids and adults think they're awesome, but they still have some issues to work out before this product is ready for consumers to purchase. I wish a name brand would make them, like c'mon, Nike. =)

reviewText: Delivery fast and as promised.

(SCROLL DOWN FOR PROS AND CONS LIST. First paragraphs are my impression and description.)

I really love this set of nose rings. I usually wear stud style nose rings but every now and then i like to change it up. Hoop nose rings, in my opinion, can really change up your look and style and can noticeably add to an outfit. They are a more noticeable, eye catching style, which will be noticed easier than small studs that tend to be more subtle. The open hoop style is one I prefer and I find them easier to wear. It leaves some open space in your nostril that I find far more comfortable for day to day wear. (TMI warning! LoL  They are WAY easier to deal with when you need to blow your nose! When I have a full hoop in my nose it can really hurt trying to blow my nose and having to maneuver it.)

This set of nose rings came in a handy little plastic box that can hold them safely for travel or storage. They were each individually wrapped in plastic sleeves before I opened them. There are five colors provided: silver, yellow/gold, black, a blue chrome finish, and a multi-colored chrome finish that reflects different colors in different light (it leans predominantly more green/yellow and resembles an oil slick appearance). The color selection includes all the basic colors for a wardrobe I could want. They are core colors that will match most of my jewelry and other accessories that I would add to a look. On top of having the go to colors of black, silver, and gold  they also include two REALLY fun ones for more funky moods and I LOVE the chrome finish on the blue nose ring as well as the REALLY COOL effect the oil-slick one has.

PROS
-Great price for a set of 5 nose rings. (~$2 for a nose ring is a great deal - Especially for a hoop in my buying experience!)
-Comes with a durable handy plastic case for storage.
-GREAT QUALITY for the PRICE! (I have worn the silver one for most of the month I have had these and it is still in GREAT condition.)
-Sellers pictures accurately show how the rings will look.
-SHINY clean finishes that have not dulled or discolored with time. (I have had these about a month and they still look new and as they were when I got them.)
-GREAT VERSATILE color selection! (Includes all basic colors for most wardrobes/matching accessories.)
-UNIQUE , VERY COOL, multi-chrome finish on one! (It really looks like an oil slick and I love the effect. It reflects different colors when caught in different light!)
-Popular 20 gauge size that will fit most nose piercings. (My nose was irritated when I first got it in, but I adjusted and they were very comfortable to wear and fit well.)
-Stainless Steel made and does not irritate my skin! (It was only irritated when I first put it in because I had tons of trouble getting it in there!)
-It does not fall out or shift much. It stays put once it is in.
-OPEN HOOP style that allows space inside the nostril and is more comfortable to wear than closed hoops that must be clicked shut. (Blowing your nose is so much easier with this style rather than closed hoops!)
-When put in the nose the right way for the odd design of the hoop, the gap DOES NOT show and it looks like a closed hoop in the nose.
-Appropriate size hoop that sits well in my nostril. (It doesnt look too big or too small for my nose and it fits well. I provided a picture showing it in for an idea on the size.)

CONS
- POOR DESIGN. They have to be put it from the INSIDE of the nostril going OUT! They are NOT EASY to get in! (I have never had to put a nose ring in from the INSIDE of the nostril going OUT so it was quite the ordeal getting the hoop in at first. I could NOT find the piercing on the inside of my nostril and irritated my piercing trying to get it in and there was some slight swelling afterwards. I cant complain for $2 a ring though and am still happy with this purchase  it is a CHALLENGE to get these in though so fair warning!!!)

Overall, I am REALLY happy with this purchase. You really cant beat the price for what you get. The rings look to be high quality as well as feeling durable and sturdy. I have had these about a month and they still look brand new and have worn VERY WELL. The size of the hoop fits my face and is a good size. The set includes all the basic colors you could want and I LOVE that black is included! It is great having gold and silver for when you want to wear different jewelry but the black is my favorite because I have A LOT of black in my wardrobe and it goes with EVERYTHING! The blue and multi-chrome ones were just added bonuses for me and really great colors. I have blue eyes so I love that blue was part of the set. (Blue is a REALLY popular color anyway it seems, so I think it was a great choice.) They feel comfortable in and I don't even feel it there that I forget I have a hoop in sometimes. The gap cant be seen when it is put in but it allows more space in the nostril. The only complaint is the odd design. I didn't know there were nose rings that had to be put in from the INSIDE OF THE NOSE! LoL In order for the gap to be hidden in the nose and for the stopper or circle on the end of the hoop to be hidden, it has to be inside the nose. I just think it is so backwards. It was CRAZY HARD to get these suckers in at first and there were SEVERAL ATTEMPTS before I got them in. If you are up for the challenge and want to save money then they are WORTH it. If you don't want to deal with getting them in and performing what seems like some pseudo-surgery looking in a mirror up your nose feeling around like you're blind dodging nose hair, then DONT GET THESE! If you are one to change your nose rings A LOT, and want these hoops to specifically wear for SHORT TERM periods, I would say the hassle of getting them in IS NOT WORTH IT. Once I finally got mine in, my piercing was slightly swollen, and to go through all that just to try and put a different color hoop in the next day, it wouldnt be worth it to me. IF I was just putting the hoop in for a day and then switching to a stud I would be fine with it though! I received these at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. These opinions are my own and I was not swayed in any way. If you have any questions let me know and I will do my best to help!
summary: Must be put in from the INSIDE of your nostril going OUT for the gap to be hidden!

reviewText: These were WAY too small even though I am a thin person and ordered the largest size.  I received this product at a discount price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review of these pants.  The pants are very cute. They just run way too small and really press against your body in a painful way.

Thanks to the other reviewers, I ordered a large even though I'm normally a small in compression pants (medium if I want them to be more comfortable). These are the tightest ones I own.  Even tighter than some under armour small shorts I have (they run small).  I'm 5'5" and 125 lbs for reference, so not someone that would ever order a large otherwise.  Thankfully they do fit if you order two sizes up.  If you can't find compression pants small enough to fit you, these are the ones you want to order!  The other thing worth mentioning is that there is no extra fabric in the back (it's the same as the front).  This means if you have a butt the waist band will sit an inch or two lower in the back than the front.

The material is nice quality and thick enough I don't have to worry about it being see through.  I wouldn't suggest them for anyone larger than myself though.

I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for my honest review.  I have personally used the product and tried my best to reflect my experience with the product so you can make a more informed purchasing decision.  Hopefully my review includes the information you would want to know before ordering.  If youve found it helpful let me know by using the buttons Amazon has provided below.

reviewText:
Summary: order two sizes up, be prepared that this is just a costume; need to buy an underskirt. But for the price, it's ok.

Based on bad reviews I was expecting something really bad, but I needed the sailor suit for a cosplay costume and for the price that's the best costume you can get. Of course, seller should've mention properly, that the sizes are Asian. Make sure you order two sizes up. And its just a cheap costume for cosplay, of course, but seriously, if you don't expect a nice silk suit for 7$, than this is the cheapest but cute costume. For its purpose and price, it works amazing. The scarf is a very cheap material and bad stitching - almost like the ones they use for making cheap flags - but works for a costume. The fabric for the skirt and collar is quite pleasant and looks pretty. The skirt is short on the back, you'd need an under skirt to go out like that, but unless you bend it looks decent. The white stripes on the collar are cheap and too shiny, and the collar itself doesn't sit perfectly on your shoulders. The material of the shirt itself is a bit stretchy and see-through. Overall, it's a really cheaply made costume, but as a costume it actually looks great. The skirt looks very cute and its shape is very much like in anime. The shirt is flattering, especially if you have more Asian body type. It's a good cheap decision for a quick cosplay. Just make sure you choose the size correctly. I'm wearing XS in US and I ordered M. It fit perfectly.
summary: Order two sizes up, you get a cheap but cute cosplay. Works for the price

One of my favorite accessories of all time is a good pair of sunglasses and I have many of them. In California these are almost a necessity and I know that the first thing that I put on when I go out anywhere is a pair of sunglasses. Not only can the right pair of sunglasses save your eyes and make it so much easier to do anything outside but also it can make any outfit look great. I love how iconic these sunglasses look and how good they actually work.

  FRAME: I love a pair of sunglasses that have a nice big frame to them. These are my favorite kind of sunglasses in those really bright days or any time I am at the beach where the sun is reflecting off the water. These frames are nice and big and keep my eyes nice and protected especially when I am near anything that it reflecting the sun. I love that the nose guard on these glasses is built into the frame because I am one that is always putting her glasses on top of her head. The nose guard being built in means that the glasses won't get stuck on my hair. The arms of the frames are nice and thin so therefore I still have full view of anything on the side of me. The gold color is great and just gives it that little bit of glamour. These glasses remind me of something that Audrey Hepburn would have worn. These are comfortable even when wearing them all day, which is great if you are like me and hardly take off your sunglasses.

  LENS: I love that these lenses are not super dark, which for me is great especially when I am using them to drive. The tint of these glasses are perfect in my opinion. I like a pair of glasses that helps out when I am on a drive. These are light enough that they are still comfortable to wear indoors but still protect well against the sun. The tint of the lenses is black so the whole pair of glasses matches perfectly. I also love the fact that these lenses are so nice and secure. Even after dropping these a couple times the lens are still nice and secure in the frame.

  OVERALL: These are great glasses. The look to these is rather iconic and still very modern. The size of the frame and lens makes is so that they are perfect in sunny weather. The color of the lens is a great shade and protects against the sun perfectly while still making you look great. These are made pretty strong and made well.

  Ireceivedthis product for free in exchange for my true and unbiased opinion. The opinions expressed in this review are mine andmine alone. Nobody or nothing has influenced my opinion. I in no way shape or formhave arelationship with thisdealer.
summary: Great size and great lens shade!!!!

I received a free sample of these glasses for testing and evaluation.

Updated:
The sunglasses is starting to break apart after less than 1 week of use. See last 2 photos.
Here are some of the pro's and con's about this sunglasses.
Pro's: The sunglasses came in with nice box, stylish triangle hardcase, and a nylon sack Great if you are giving it away as a gift. As indicated on the box, it has UV protection lenses. The lenses are oversized, which is the main reason why I bought it. One thing which I think is very thoughtful is it also come with a tiny screwdrive for the sunglasses.
Con's: The quality of the sunglasses was ok. It does feel premium. It definitely doesn't feel like a designer's sunglasses, more like night market quality. (You get what you pay for.)
Overall, I'm still happy with it.

Even though I purchased this product at no cost, the opinion is entirely mine. As an Amazon customer, I rely on customer reviews to make my purchasing decision. So I hope this review will be helpful to you as well.
