reviewText: A wonderful hat for the summertime at the beach or marina!  I got this stylish with fast delivery thanks to my PRIME membership, love that.  So lets talk about the hat1  First, definite thumbs up.  For the price, this is a great value.  The material seems to be some kind of nylon blend or something, and you can tell that it will hold up well, far better than the straw types I have owned.  The item packaging was a tad disappointing, in that it came tightly packed in a small box.  While the hat definitely can be crunched, crushed, smashed, sat on, spilled on a and a host of other things I haven't managed to accidentally do to my hats and seems to handle them all just fine, the long exposure in the crumpled position in the box makes it memorize some bumps and wrinkles that are difficult to get smoothed out.  Nothing was broken or ruined, but instead of having the nice smooth look in the picture to the right, it has more of an irregular floppy look like many of the beach hats do where the brim kind of "ripples" around the hat rather than a front and back dip like the photo shows on the listing, and which attracted me to the hat in the first place.  However my hubby recommended trying to smooth it out more with a warm iron (not hot since plastic and nylon can melt) and I may post a follow up on that if anyone is interested.  That said, the hat itself seems well made for the money and fit pretty much as expected.  My head is in the small to medium range and it fit fine, but not tight.  There is a fabric sweat band around the inside which is very nice and missing on some of the overseas sourced hats I have bought in the past.  So plus there!  It also has a built in head strap for those windy days at the beach to keep it secure on your head instead of blowing away!  So another nice one there.  The overall construction is sturdy.  I did find a few hanging clear nylon threads which I show in one of the photos I think, but I clipped them off myself and gently toasted the ends to prevent any kind of slippage of the thread.  Again, something I see with most hats like this so its not unusual.  The seams are solid and the overall feel is a mid-weight level so the hat has some substance to it.  I love the look and the bold stripes and the colors are uniform and crisp with no variations or fades, etc. This is definitely a great buy and for going out shopping, to the beach, whatever its a nice fashion statement with a wide range of outfits.  it looks great with a sundress! I have a white one with black polkadots with matching pumps and this is just stunning with it creating an all white & black ensemble. Splash in some colors with accessories and WOW! While I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review, I review all of the products that I buy, discount or otherwise, honestly and completely, regardless of any discount. I was not paid for my review in any way. Everything stated here are my own opinions of and experiences with the product. If this review has helped you, please click the "Yes" button below. I always like to know when I am helping people out. Thanks!

This ankle bracelet is very pretty and sweet. The 4 little hanging heart charms are very cute. The main decoration is a thicker double heart charm with a little hanging teardrop Cubic Zirconia crystal. The hearts also have little crystals on them. Very detailed and pretty. I like the way that little hanging crystal moves around as I walk. It is a very pretty and feminine ankle bracelet.. This is a long ankle bracelet. It is about 9.8 inches long with an added 1 more inch extender chain. So it hangs really low on my foot. Below the ankle bone. The clasp is a spring ring type clasp. This is made from Sterling Silver. I found the 925 stamp on the hang tag on the end, the tag near the clasp, and on the clasp. The chain is an OK thickness. It is not overly thin. Because this ankle bracelet hangs so low it looks best with flat sandals or bare feet. You can make it smaller but then you would have to hook the clasp to the links on the chain which are kind of small. It does hook on but not really properly or all the way. Just the front pin part of the clasp. And then you would also end up with a much longer hanging chain. Just in case you were wondering.... Very cute and well made ankle bracelet. Especially if you are into hearts. The long length and extra extender chain is great for people with wider ankles. It came in a nice gift box with a polishing cloth and a velvet pouch. *****DISCLOSURE: I received this item free of charge to evaluate and review. All opinions are my own.

reviewText: Well, this has to be one of the most conflicted reviews I've ever given on here.  It's a very cute dress, and at 5'5", it reaches down to my feet, which is what I expected.  The waist fits perfectly, and the dress itself flows gracefully when I walk.  But the top is a different story.  It's too large for my frame, and there is virtually no support to hold it up.  Simply bending over causes the shoulder straps to completely slide off, bringing the entire top down with it.  And given that it is completely backless, one would need a very unusual bra to wear with this dress:  one that has no straps or back support of any kind.  Wear with caution.  3 stars.

I have ordered a few clothing pieces that had China sizes eg. 70/80/90  and it is usually not the same across the board.  I have a big baby boy who is almost 4 months old.  I ordered size 80 which is the 6-12 months size.  I knew that I want to make sure my boy will be able to wear this for spring time.
Upon receiving this very cute outfit I was very happy that the size is what I expected.  It should fit him next spring.  China has very strange sizing and measure your baby if you have to make sure it will fit.

As for the fabric, it is very soft and stretchy which I love.  The shirt has 2 KAM snaps on the side for easy dressing.  The pants have an elastic waist, which is perfect for my growing baby boy.  The quality is better than expected and is made very well.

One of the things that you should now is that the tag on the outfit says "dry clean" and "hang dry".  I do not dry clean my baby clothes, as that is not in our budget and I do not have time to go to the dry cleaners to drop baby clothes off.....who does??...
I did wash this outfit on Gentle Cycle and it turned out just fine.  I did not notice any issue with putting it in the washing machine, just do it on your "Gentle Cycle" I decided to just hang dry it as I want to make sure I do not shrink it in the dryer.

Other than the washing instructions this really is a very cute outfit and I am very happy that it is true to size. I definitely recommend this 2 piece Batman outfit to any momma. I can't wait to put my baby boy in this, this coming Spring.
summary: True to Size! So Cute. Happy Customer!

reviewText: This outfit is so freaking cute!!!! I fell in love with it the moment I opened it! The material is a nice breathable material. I wouldn't order this thinking it will keep your kid warm in the winter but it's a great fall outfit. (For Cali babies at least). Love love love.

This is a super cute set, and obviously quite trendy at the moment. I love that these can be worn together or separately. I bought them for my son, but I feel like this set is pretty gender neutral.

I love the little harem pants. They are definitely very on trend at the moment, and there are other brands that would sell just the pants for more than this set costs in total.

The quality of these is quite good, and I love how soft the fabric is. The tshirt is very, very soft and almost buttery.

I would say that these fit a little bit small, so order up a size. Especially given that babies grow so dang fast!!

I would recommend these to buy for your own child, or as a gift to someone else. Because I believe that they are gender neutral, I think you could buy these for a boy or a girl.

I did receive a discount in exchange for an honest review.

This outfit arrived very quickly and came just as pictured. I ordered the smallest size(70cm) which from the reviews was stated to fit 6-9 months which I would say is pretty accurate. I have a 1 month old who weighs almost 12lbs and was born at 10lbs 7 oz so he will probably get to wear this outfit around 4-5 months since he is a big boy lol. This outfit seems to be of great quality and very well made. I love that the pants have some stretch since I am cloth diapering which creates some bulk issues with pants fitting but since these stretch no issues there. I also love that this set is unisex making it great for gift giving. The material is also very soft and the colors are bright. Overall I am extremely satisfied with this set and would recommend to anyone who is looking for a cute outfit that is affordable and looks great!

***Disclaimer: I have received this product at a discounted rate or for free in exchanged for my HONEST unbiased opinion/review. Receiving this product at a discount or for free has in NO way affected my opinion or review of this product.***

This is such a cute outfit! I absolutely love my little man in it! Unfortunately, it won't fit him very long because it's already quite tight on him. I ordered the 70cm and he's 18 months old. He's about average for his size and is fitting in other 12-18 month clothing quite well. I'd suggest ordering larger sizes depending on what your child fits in. The material is really soft and the design is very cute! There is a cute little snap at the top of one of the shoulders to help get it on, so that it won't get stuck on their heads.  The only issue I have with it, other than it being smaller than planned, is that there were a lot of loose threads left on the garments and they weren't trimmed well after they were finished sewing the seams.  I had to go over it and trim everything off so that he wouldn't get snagged in them or pull on them and rip his clothes.  Other than those issues, I am very happy with the outfit.

Full Disclosure: I was blessed to receive this item at a discounted price or for free in exchange for my testing, inspecting and reviewing it. I received no compensation for my review and always give my honest and unbiased opinion of each product. My words and the rating I provided are my own and are based on my own personal experience with this item.

For the price, this is a great belt; however, there are definite signs that this is a cheap belt and won't last long.  The dye is rubbing away already from the edges of the belt after being threaded through the loop. Also, the inside of the belt is rough and unfinished so it catches on clothing and rubs against itself (rubbing off more dye). Also, the loop is only stapled, not stitched.

Finally, the belt has a hard time staying tight throughout a day's wear.  It loosens and slides around unless you do the butterfly knot.

reviewText:
I've had to subtract 2-3 stars from some watches that impressed me during the first week, but another mechanical wind-up at this price has performed so well for the last several weeks that I'm quite confident about the practical (and educational) value of this one--and if the watch should fail prematurely, you're still left with an interchangeable leather-style band that's worth, minimally, the price of the watch.

Many watch-wearers today have never owned a mechanical watch (the only game in town through my high school years).  It's renewable energy, and it's more failsafe than quartz watches that often arrive in the mailbox shortly before the battery is completely drained.

Give it 20-40 turns each morning, and you should be good to go.  The band is relatively strong, with two reinforced "free loops" (usually the first parts of the watch to break loose).  Some youngsters may view the ornate Victorian gold-metal watch-face as "cool"; others may find it pretentious and "unwearably uncool."  So hedge your bets: order this one and another with a plainer, more conventional watch-face.  The grand-kid gets the one he likes most (or is has the least aversion to).  The other is for you.  Still a good deal at these prices.

You'll notice that some "automatic winders" are almost as inexpensive.  But they're also twice the thickness and weight--and they're often dodgy to operate ("Did I move actively enough today to make the watch wind automatically? If not, how many times should I wind the crown?")  Keep it simple, especially for a first non-digital, non-quartz, non-automatic watch.

I think that if I had a bigger bust size then I would have an issue with being to exposed.  I feel that I need to add a few more stitches to the bottom of the neck-line where it meets the waist band to secure the loose fabric in place.  I hate to have to purchase something and need to alter it right away.  I have worn this blouse with a sheer undershirt and a scarf to make sure I am not exposing myself and I have received multiple complements on it.  If this blouse fits your body it is a great buy. Only downfall is the stud in the back was a wee bit off centered/slanted. But overall, I'm pleased with this purchase and I believe my niece (and her mom) will be too!

reviewText:
For me, the fit is the most crucial area when wearing a dress. Since I'm slightly bottom heavy, I need a dress that gives me some flexibility in the hip area. So, a flared skirt is perfect for me. In addition, details are important to me. The buttons and lacy Peter Pan collar definitely gives it a unique flair. And, remembering from Stacy and Clinton's "What Not to Wear", I notice that the dress is ideally divided into three segments- the top, waist, and the skirt. By dividing up these areas, it definitely will accentuate one's waist and gives it a fitted look.
Now, with the size chart (within the pictures), I double-checked several times since the measurements are listed in cm. After converting it into inches, I made sure to pick my correct size. The 87cm for the bust size was a good fit since I'm a 34B.
I did not have any smelly issues with the merchandise. It was folded compactly within the package, and I need to iron or steam clean it to get rid of the wrinkles. I purchased this item at a promotional rate in exchange for a honest review.
summary: Gorgeous dress that is fitting for any special occasion

I get more compliments on these tops than any other piece of clothing in my wardrobe.  I bought a white one a few years back that is marked XXL.  This  black one is marked 3X even though I ordered a 2X again. It fits well going around my bust and waist.  They are way too long for my 5' 2" 145 pound, usually a size 12 size frame.  The lace in the front lays about 3 inches longer than the black backing.  Here's what I do.  I lay it flat and take a small pair of very sharp embroidery scissors and cut the lace back following the contours of the black rose pattern.  It takes about a minute to do but well worth it.  I wash it on the gentle cycle or by hand.
summary: BEAUTIFUL top with one modification.  Sizing can be iffy.

OMG they are so cute. I bought these for an event where I would be wearing an evening gown and I loved that they were shape wear but still sexy in a throw-back 50s hollywood way. I was a little bummed because I didn't end up able to wear them with the dress as they came up too high (the dress was low back). This wasn't the fault of the products, just the way the cookie crumbled. Soooo if you're not sure if these will come up too far for the attire you're trying to wear, be advised that you can't roll them down. They have that reinforced vertical boning structure that corsets have in the back. This is GREAT because it means they won't roll down on you by mistake. And there's no boning in the front, which is also great because it makes the product nice and comfortable. The lace part at the bottom might potentially be a little snug, so if you have some extra junk in the trunk, I'd suggest going a size up so you don't have a visibly noticeable bump along your thighs.

Just a disclaimer: the manufacturer has offered me another pair for a review, but that offer did not affect my review or opinion. If you WANT to read into it, you could notice that I loved the product enough that getting a second pair sounds nice (but you can also see that I leave lots of reviews without any offer of products for them) So, it's honest for you, the consumer!

When I received them, within the appropriate amount of time, I was happily relieved of those fears.  They are not bulky on my face and they are not heavy.  They are sturdy, so you have to expect some amount of weight, but it is not bad.  These look really cool on my face.  The tan line they will leave might be a little annoying, though.  So, I have resorted to wait until the sun is not so strong and hot here in Northern Illinois, USA, to wear them regularly. reviewText:
As soon as I put this shirt on, I noticed that my arms became abnormally large. I suddenly had the urge to want to wrestle Hulk Hogan in a cage match again and had a strong desire to snap into a Slim Jim. I bought oversized glasses and a tye-dye bandanda, then proceeded to make threats to every person in my path. I challenged them to ladder matches for a shot at one of my 6 world championship belts, but nobody dared to even consider my offer. I normally don't act like this, but I learned that that's just what happens when you buy Macho Man memorabilia. I haven't been the same ever since ordering this shirt - the madness continues to run wild. I have random "OOOOOH YEEEAH!!" outbursts in public and have been kicked out of schools and libraries for my aggressive tone and threats. My wife and family are extremely concerned about me. They've had to bail me out of jail 7 times in the past month for putting people through tables and dropping elbows at the bar. Eventually, they'll come to understand that when I wear this shirt, I'm just too hot to handle and too cold to hold. With this shirt, I am, indeed, the cream of the crop.
In all seriousness, the shirt is a little small but I'm happy with it (I'm 5'8, 190lbs). I recommend ordering a size up.
summary: I haven't been the same since ordering this shirt

reviewText: A friend introduced me to Drusy quartz recently and I have fallen in love with this stone. I especially enjoy the different colors that the quartz comes in, and I own several different pieces. When I had the opportunity to purchase this pendant at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review, I jumped at the chance and could not wait to receive this item. When I took this pendant out of the box I was completely impressed! The colors are vibrant and the addition of the gold colored ribbon that snakes through the different pieces of quartz in a nice touch.  There are different colors of Drusy quartz in this pendant including pink, purple, yellow and green. I have found that I can wear this pendant with many different outfits, and whatever color that particular outfit is, is the color that will pop from the pendant. I do have to say that the pictures of the pendant do not do it justice, and this is much more beautiful in person.  I am really happy with this selection and I expect to be able to wear this for a long time to come. You can tell that this pendant is made with care.  I also disclose that I purchased this item at a discount for an honest and unbiased review and I am grateful to have that opportunity.

reviewText:
This shirt is a casual shirt with a round neck collar.  The material is supposedly top quality.  I thought the top was going to be super cute.  It looks nice and comfortable.  It took a while to receive this product in the mail.  It did arrive earlier than expected though.  I opened it and rolled my eyes.  This is clearly not correct sizing.  I went through the sizing chart and everything.  I wanted to be 100% positive that it was going to fit me given that it details that the sizing is not US.  Well, the sizing is clearly super small.  This shirt would fit a tiny person or a child.  There is no way it would fit an average person.  I was super sad about it.  I really wanted to at least try this top on.  As it is I don't want to chance ripping it or stretching it out.  The material is nice and I like the design of it.  The cut out shoulder parts are nice.  I'm always worried when ordering clothes online that is why I made sure to check the sizing chart and such.  I guess this is just a fail.  Maybe I'll give it to someone who can fit into it.  Like a 10 year old...maybe.  Overall it's a cute shirt but the sizing is all wrong.  The material is rather thin and I don't think it would hold up to stretching so I don't think I'll be wearing this shirt.  Good to give to a child.

I received this product for free or at a discount.  The only requirement was that I give an honest review.  There is no reward for a positive review and no punishment for a negative review.  This was my honest opinion of the product.  I only accept a free or discounted product if I or my family will use the item and want the item.  I know that I rely on other reviews prior to purchasing an item and I hope that you found this review helpful.

reviewText:
I love this blouse, it is roomy on my breast and not tight on my belly (I have some extra "curves" there, thanks to my kids), looks cute enough to go out on a Friday night with jeans and heels, or just a short and slips. Also the kind style of this cut normally doesn't make justice to chunky lady like me, I have tried another ones, but this one doesn't make me look like a football player on the top, the V neck is just great for my kind of shape and clears the neck so it looks very good. I am only 30 and don't want to be a soccer mom quite yet, so this is a perfect top. The image is true-to-color. The front is just a tad short, but not enough that I'd size up (if I raise my arms over my head, you can see about 1" of midriff--that's all). The material is really lightweight and soft, though a little bit see-through. You can pretty easily see the outline of my bra cups, so if that really bothers you then wearing an undershirt is going to be necessary. Stitching on the neckline is uneven on my shirt, but I'm willing to live with that.

It is a little long, but as I am only 5'1, almost everything that I buy that isn't petite is going to be really long. I love the fit, you just need to watch the sizing.

Only complaint i have about this top is the sizing. You're not going to get the look in the picture because its not big enough no matter what size you order. If you weigh about 100-110lbs then you have a better chance. I normally wear a medium in tops. I ordered the xl and  the fit and look i got from that size was close to fitting right. It's slightly boxy looking and the sleeves don't drape they are fitted. It is longer in back, covers the butt completely. It's soft and the stitching is fine. This top overall is OK but would have been way better if the sizing was accurate. This is perfect for spring & summer. Also, since I did size up for the flowing fit the sleeves aren't tight.

reviewText: I bought this shirt because I liked the way it looked in the picture advertising it. I was disappointed however by what I received. I ordered the XL thinking it would be really big and flowing, but its just not. I wear a 38DDD so my bust does take up a significant amount of the material. As far as the overall quality of the shirt, it is basic, and cheaply made. I think it would shrink terribly if dried in the dryer, and the stitching is slightly off in some spots. Basically you get what you pay for. It is a thin, kinda crummy shirt at a fairly cheap price. I received a slight discount on this product in exchange for my honest feedback.

Disclaimer: I received this product at a discounted/ promotional price in exchange for my truthful and unbiased review. The seller plays no part nor influences any part of my review. I liked this dress.

This is a beautiful shirt. My favorite part about it is the almost silky material. It is so soft and comfortable to wear. The cut and material make it very flattering as well. After a couple children, I do not have the body that I once had in my teens. This shirt allows me to still look fantastic while hiding the hill that has grown in my middle region.

The sizing is on the larger size. I normally wear a medium shirt in everything and I ordered a medium. This shirt is loose on me, but not to where I can't wear it. Baggy is a good term for how the medium fit on me.

The quality on the construction is excellent. The seams are all stitched with a surged edge and then sewn down. The stitching is all tightly done and very well done too. I carefully examined all of the stitching and found no rips, tears, or fraying when it first arrived. Since I began to wear this shirt, I've had none of the stitching come loose either. The material is a higher end material than you see in most shirts as well. The material really flows and is light.

Overall, I would highly recommend this shirt to anyone. The materials and craftsmanship are high quality. It looks wonderful on me. I would just keep in mind that it may fit slightly baggy unless you go a size down. I rate this 5/5 stars. I did receive this at a discounted or free rate for my honest and unbiased opinion, but all opinions expressed are my own.

reviewText:
I love simple dresses. This is a great, comfortable little dress that works for a lot of occasions.

It fits very well. The stretchiness of it makes it comfortable and easy to wear. Even if you order a size up or down, I think it would still fit. The straps are adjustable, which is really nice so you can show more or less cleavage or legs depending on how you have them adjusted. There's a thin lace border along the top and bottom that add a little fancy aspect to it, but it can be dressed down with some sandals or up with some heels. Throw in any color of accessories for a pop.

Overall, it is super comfy to wear. There's no itchiness, roughness or discomfort. It feels great and looks cute. No complaints here. I was sent this for testing and review purposes. That has no bearing on my rating or review of it. I always provide honest feedback regardless of whether or not it was free, discounted or I paid full price.

This purse arrived in a dust bag so it's nice to be able to use that in case you need/want to store this long term.

I selected "red" but this is actually more like a rose/blush pink instead. Not what I was hoping for but still a nice color.

The gold accents are very pretty. Not loud but just enough to add a little flair to the purse.

Inside its fully lined with a thick, dark brown fabric. Not flimsy or thin.

I like that this could be a hand bag or shoulder/cross body. The strap is both adjustable and removable.

reviewText: Color was much lighter than shown and did not go well with my skin tone.

This is a very beautiful piece of Jewelry to have. My husband and I are not technically married yet, but he says we are way more than that since we are living together with our child. He has not got me a ring yet due to money. he said that he does not want me to have a ring and keep changing it until he finds the right one, so I talked him in to getting cheap rings until we can afford the one he wants. Honestly, i do not know why he needs to get me a real expensive ring when i have this one. This ring is so beautiful, and matter of fact people thought it was real. I wore it out and the compliments that I got were amazing. I did happen to tell them that it is not real but where I got it from and how. The ring sparkles as if it were real, and when i washed my hands, i have kept the ring on and my finger has not turned green, or the ring didn't tarnish. I recommend this ring it is really so beautiful, one of the best platinum plated rings I have ever received. this for a free rate for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions expressed are from  my own experiences.

When I travel I like to leave the real stuff at home and take some bling with me just in case I lose or misplace my jewelry. This ring is a great example of some great bling. It has great sparkle which is always a plus. There is one large oval stone in the center of the ring surrounded by 12 more cubic zirconia stones. The band consists of three rows of cubic zirconia stones with 4 stones in each row. They cascade about half way down the sides of the ring. When you are wearing the ring you usually cant tell where they stop. The center stones measure about inch (centered) and the band about 5/16 inch (from tip to tip of stones). The band is platinum plated. The fit was perfect for me. I wear a size 8 and thats what I ordered and it fit like a glove. It looks well-made. The prongs are tight and when I ran a piece of cloth and my finger over it there were no snags or sharp edges to get caught. Included is a nice red box which is great if you plan on giving this ring as a gift. I received this ring free to use and evaluate for my unbiased and honest review.

reviewText: The best bras for strapless shirts and dresses!! But these and you will not be disappointed

I use adhesive bras all the time. I like to wear strappy dresses often and hate bra straps showing, or the top of bras being visible. This is a great tool for women!
A lot of the ones I've used have been the cloth type, but I've come to like the gel ones better. When you're wearing them, it hardly looks like you're wearing a bra at all. They keep the shape of your breasts well and don't make them looked smushed down. There's a nice curve to them; shirts and dresses drape really well. Plus they feel better to touch.
The entire back side of these are adhesive and I would suggest saving the plastic bit that goes over it so you can keep it clean and wear it again. I have small breasts that are farther apart from eachother and have a hard time finding bras that will flatter them. I've been able to wear this a couple times and the adhesive has stayed pretty well. I'll wear it until it starts peeling because they'll stay sticky a long time.
These are hard to find the perfect spot to stick them though. Ive found that the top will dig into my skin and give the appearance that I'm wearing a bra that's too small for me so I end up trying to cover the whole breast (which isn't hard for me because they're tiny) instead of just cupping the bottom. But then it doesn't work well for low cut dresses or the likes and there's only a few shirts which cut out backs that I'll use these with
They are a little most difficult to wear when you're sweaty. The sweat gets trapped and can start making it uncomfortable and easy to peel off.
I do use this, but not as often as I'd like. I have others that work much better and this is mostly a back up or just worn with certain shirts
I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion

reviewText:
I normally wear a size XL shirt (here in the US). I knew that this shirt came from China and the sizes there are much smaller, so I ordered the 3XL size, which is the biggest one they offered. They did show measurements for their sizes and the measurements for the 3XL seemed to match that of a size US XL and other shirts that I own so I took a chance and bought it, despite there were no reviews at that time.

It took about two and a half weeks to get to me in California and I just received the shirt in the mail today. It is MUCH smaller around the chest ("Bust" as they call it) than they have listed in their measurements. I can barely button up the shirt, and when I do, it is so tight that the shirt is unwearable. The sleeves were also a tiny bit long for me (I normally wear a 34-35 in sleeves), but that wouldn't have been a big deal if I could wear the shirt.

The quality of the shirt seems fine. Had the shirt fit OK, I would have been happy with the quality. In the pictures of this listing though, the buttons on the shirt are shown as black. The shirt I received has white buttons. If the shirt actually fit me and I could wear it, I would have been disappointed by this because I definitely would have preferred the black buttons.

Anyway, I would proceed with caution if ordering this shirt. If you are normally a size US XL, I would stay away from it. If you are normally a size US L, this shirt will probably fit you around the front, but the shoulders and sleeves may be a bit long.

I would return this shirt, but I would have to ship it back to China to get a refund of US$8 so it's just not worth it.
summary: Quality of shirt is fine, but don't believe the sizing measurements they have in the listing

reviewText:
I ordered one size up to be sure it fit and fit it does.  I am also 5'9" and I never purchase clothes online because everything is consistently too short.  Well this maxi dress surprised me.

At first when it came, I was lifted it up and it appeared that the entire bodice was see-through.  But I tried it on, and it is not.  Certainly you would wear a nude or black bra.  The top is made out of a double-layered stretch lace.  My fits more like an empire waste than the seam at the waste.  The see-through chiffon over-layer goes almost all the way to the floor on me (just high enough not to trip on it, and I no longer wear much of a heel) and the chiffon skirt is pleated in the front for lots of extra room and makes it flow nicely.  There is an stretch knit under-layer that goes down to my knees.  So you cannot see anything above my knees, just below through the chiffon layer.

I was so pleasantly surprised as how nice this looks on as well as the softness of the lace and the design of the flowy skirt.  I love it and can't wait to find an event to wear it to. I got the black one so it's a bit formal for me to wear to casual events. But I vacation and cruise a lot, and this will be perfect as it won't wrinkle in a suitcase. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Very lovely, well-fitting, flowy chiffon maxi dress.

reviewText:
Problem: I can't wear a ball cap when I flop my hair on top of my head and I can't lean back in a chair in a cowboy-type hat. Solution: A visor, and I'm quite happy with this one.

When I first took the visor out of the box I thought the bill was comically long. It is quite a bit longer than the average ball cap bill (the photo is accurate), but if sun protection is what you're going for then that makes perfect sense, doesn't it? I've found that it does provide very good coverage, and keeps me from squinting even if I'm not wearing sunglasses. I tend to have to adjust hats down quite a lot, so I'm very happy with the adjustable velcro at the back. It's easy to get it sized just right; plus, if you're concerned about messing up your 'do you're all set because you can completely undo it and not have to pull it down over your head from the top.

The material seems to be good quality. The inside surface is soft (kind of terry-like) and - though I haven't been able to test it in hot, sweaty situations yet - it seems like it will be absorbent. Overall very pleased.

I did receive a discount on this item in exchange for providing feedback. My review is honest and unbiased.

This visor will do what it needs to for me: however if like to note it felt very "Long" as in it extended further off my face than a 'normal' visor.  I will be using this to wear in the rain to keep the rain off my glasses while running, so length of it is OK.
If you planned on playing a sport, it may be too long. The visor comes pre-curved and curves pretty appropriately with a Velcro closure- quite strong! The material is solid and there are no loose strings to be seen- overall well made just maybe a little disproportionate.

I received this at a reduced cost in exchange for a fair and honest review.

I have always been a fan of wearing visors.  I like how they don't mess up my hair but protect my face and eyes from the sun.  This visor is nice!  It's made of a thick material and the brim is nice and long.  It will be great when I'm outdoors all day gardening because the brim will shade my entire face.  I usually only wear a moisturizer with SPF under my make up in the summer and no additional sun block on my face because I always wear a hat.  This visor will be perfect for protecting my entire face all day.  The only complaint that I have is that the material attracts my yellow lab's hair, but that is the story of my life :)  I purchased this visor at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: I like how they don't mess up my hair but protect ...

I had some aviators but wanted something slightly smaller. Sure I was hesitant about ordering such a low price item, but why not. They arrived within the promised time frame and were securely packaged. They are true to the posted photos. The glasses are dark, which I love. They are polarized, which I verified with my computer screen. The glasses have a good feel to them, not cheap feeling, they have heft. The arms have a rubber type finish on them, for grip, I am assuming. They fit snugly on my face and the nose pads were secured to the frame, they are black so these are all around black glasses. There is a slight smell to the item, but honestly, I expected that. The rubber on the arms is where it originated from, hopefully it dissipates. The case did a good job of keeping the items safe while in transport. It is a hard zippered case and came with a black cleaning cloth for the glasses.
I looked out my window with them on, worked great. It was a bright AZ summer day and I didn't feel any strain on my eyes.

I should have known that this would happen when I read in the product information that the shirt has Asian sizing. I have limited experience with Asian sizing but this is the third shirt I haven't been comfortable in because they are just so small and the length is just too short! I'm 5'6" and right now around 140lbs. I normally wear a medium in most things. I ordered a size 8, which one of the size charts says is an extra large, because of the warning about Asian sizing. I figured I would play it safe and buy two sizes up. And it's still too short. Just now its a little more wide than I'd like as well. In my opinion, it's about the length the average twelve year old girl would wear. It's not like belly shirt short or anything, just not as long as a regular tshirt. And certainly not as long as a US size extra large normally is!

Besides the length of the shirt, it does seem to be of good quality. It seems well stitched and the material has some heft. The material is nice and feels like cotton but stretchy. I can't say I don't like it. It's just a little different is all. It does feel good against my skin. It feels like it would hold up well over time.

Sadly I would not purchase this shirt or any other clothes from this seller again. Well, at least not those with asian sizing. I think I've now learned to steer clear of that! I wouldn't recommend this to a friend either unless she was a petite woman.

The only reason I didn't give this shirt 5 stars is because I feel like the product description is a bit misleading. It describes it as a loose fitting sweatshirt style of shirt. However, the gray portions of this shirt is not made of anything remotely close to sweatshirt material. It's just your every day, lightweight, t-shirt material.

Now, with that out of the way, let me say that this was 1 of only 2 items, out of an order of 6 items(from various sellers) that actually fit me! The quality is excellent(though I AM disappointed that it's not sweatshirt material), and it fits me in a very flattering way. It's not too snug in the chest, fits just right on my skinny arms, and the length is not-too-short-not-too-long. What I mean by that is, it's long enough for me to raise my hands arms over my head, without showing my belly, but not so long that it hits me in an awkward spot on my petite frame.

Here's my personal info, for reference:

I'm 5'3", apprx 128lbs, 36 DD, and tend to carry my excess weight in my belly and booty. My natural waist measurement fluctuates between 37" and 38". I ordered this shirt in a Small, and it doesn't cling to my belly at all.

I ordered an XL and it looked to small for a hamster, which was way too bad, because it looked really cute.  I can see the sizing being different, but an extra large is not less than five inches of fabric!  Its smaller than my bra!  I would have loved it and I was really disappointed.  Also, the fabric was really thin, tee shirt thin, but thinner!  It is getting to be a pet peeve of mine.  I understand that other countries that produce ladies wear may have different sizing, but if an article of clothing is going to be an American extra small, when it is labeled extra LARGE, then I think they should make a special note of it in the description.  Saying, "get a size larger", is just deceptive when they really mean, get four sizes larger.  I usually wear a medium shirt and can wear small tee shirts.  Don't cheat people with rotten, old cotton material thats been sitting in a warehouse for ten years, use it to make a shirt with the least possible fabric you can get away with, and then mark it large so you can sell it to people who you know won't be able to wear it and hope they don't bother to try and get their money back.  That is called a scam where I come from.  I'm not going to waste time getting my money back, but I am going to tell everyone i know NOT to buy from this company and not buy there ever again myself.  I don't like people taking advantage of me, and that is exactly what this felt like.  It isn't about a crappy tee shirt, it's about treating people with respect.
summary: MAKES A GREAT HEADBAND (If you have a small head)!

This is an alright top for the price but I would not get it again. If the material were nicer and heavier so that it hung closer to my waist, it would be more flattering. Instead it's a soft but slightly itchy cheap cotton that is very lightweight and instead of creating baggy folds that taper and highlight my petite form it holds its shape and gapes awkwardly. Poorly-fitted, not sexy.

They may as well have made this one size because if you look at the size chart there is only a cm difference between sizes. I ordered the x-large because I usually wear a 34B and I wanted the look in the photos: baggy with full length sleeves. I wish I'd gone with the medium because it's much too roomy around my 25" waist. Baggy, sure, but because this is lightweight cotton and not something heavier or conforming like nylon/spandex, it holds it's shape and just gapes awkwardly around my entire waist. it doesn't fold and cling and look sexy or highlight my petite waist. It looks awkward. I also thought it was going to be grey and white and it kind of is but it's more of a heather grey-blue that I'm not fond of. Finally, it's not as long in the back as the pictures make it out to be. It almost looks like it's longer in the back but in truth it's cut straight across and leaves as much of the back exposed as it does the front. I don't know what shirt the model is wearing but mine shows about half my back and again because it's a light cotton material it billows and holds it's shape so I have a big gap back there. I do like the long sleeves but they are not fitted to the wrist as they appear in the photos. They are loose and open.

These boys pajamas / cotton robot graphic 2 piece kids sleep set are nice and soft with a tagless design.  They're quite thin, which will be good for warmer nights (hence the short-sleeved shirt).  My son tends to over-heat easily, but with these he should do just fine.  The material is soft, but not quite as silky soft as that new cotton blend that all the leggings seem to be made of.  The fit is either as expected or maybe slightly on the small side.  I'm happy with the size.  I ordered a 7 so my son can use these later (he's currently using a size 5).  I like the Star Wars design and the fact that the pants have a lot of blue yet still match the mostly black shirt top.  I received these at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Very nice and cool pajama set for boys.  Thin material.

This scarf is really comfortable too with its soft fabric. I forget I have it on. I like that it is made in the USA and the quality is truly exceptional.

Very pretty dress. It reminds me of a poodle skirt. Nice fabric on the top part, soft and not too thin or heavy. The skirt part is a lot thicker but not so thick its hot. The skirt is a little long for my tastes. It hits me below the knees. Which is true to the era style. There is a zipper on the side to put on, take off easier. Washes well without fading. Very comfortable. This would be something I would wear as a theme outfit and not often but only because of the skirt length. Plenty of people like this length and would wear whenever. This is just not my style. It is very pretty and comfortable to wear. I like the larger ribbon type on the waist and higher waist making me look smaller. I wear a 12/medium usually and this was just a little big but did shrink a little in the wash. Did not damage it just made it a little tighter which does loosen after wearing. Overall pretty dress. Easy to wear.

reviewText: Love it
Pretty pretty pretty pretty pretty nice fit.

First, I want to point out that I'm roughly a US 12, but I have large arms for my size (probably closer to a US 16 for my arms).

I ordered the size 12 (I followed what would fit most properly around my bust) and it fits fine, but it's how it fits my body is why it doesn't have a higher rating. I am 5'10", and have a longer torso and arms. Because my arms are wider than most my size, my arm fills the sleeve completely, meaning it's breathable, but there is no extra room like on the model. The arm length is also about 2 inches too short. Compared to the model photo, the sleeves end on my right above the wrist.

I'm self-conscious about my figure (and large arms) and try to either go for the nice "flowy" look, or an hour glass look. With the shorter, more fitted sleeves, and then having a lot of excess fabric for the stomach, I just felt I looked really boxy and wide versus "flowy" like the model. However, that may be more a problem with how I'm built versus the top itself. Again, if you are more evenly proportioned, you will probably like it if you follow your bust size on the sizing chart.

It is a thin material (there is a thin second layer for the torso so it's not see-through), so if you're self-conscious about your arms like myself, you can wear this in hot temps just fine. However, if you have larger arms for your size, you may feel funky in this top. I ordered another top from Zanzea as well, and it fits perfect, so it's just the style of this particular one!
summary: Nice top for the price, but not very flattering for my body type.

Now it's important to note that I normall wear a size small and I am 5"4. When I put this on the first thing I noticed is there was a rather odd smell. So I would definitely recommend giving this a good wash before wear. After this, I noticed that it fit really well. I enjoyed the ways my curves were all noticeable in this. Then I noticed as I walked around in it that you can actually move in it. It's made of a stretchy material that's not too thin but that justs mold with the body for every step.

My biggest recommendation would be to fix the off smell. Other than that I loved it.

P.S. I purchased this item at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion!

I don't think I have ever gotten so many compliments on a costume before!! I am 5'7 and 140 lbs so a large was a good fit. It was a little loose but better loose than to tight for me! It is such a fun costume to wear. I wore Spanx Thinstincts Open-Bust Mid-Thigh Bodysuit under to suck in all the goods. It works with just nude underwear too. If you love sea creatures and the comfort of wearing basically a pj onesie...then this is the right costume for you!

I loved this costume LOL! I am 5'7 145 ish, and I have a real big booty; when I put this costume on the first time, it was pretty tight on the hips + butt, and I thought whoops maybe should have gotten the large but OH WELLL party was in 2 days so no time for any of that! when the day of party rolled around, I wore some lacy beige boy-short undies and did a few lunges around my buddy's apartment, and all was a-ok. my buddy said, you bought it off the internet and just put it on and it fits like that?? and I said YAS. you could kind of see the undies but who cares, it's halloween and I'm wearing a shark onesie, like worse things could happen. looking back at photos I can't see any evidence of undies so that's great! anyway I put "fits somewhat smal" but if you are a more proportionate human than I am (and you probably are, srs) it's probably going to be just fine.

another bonus was that I spilled something on it the first night but wanted to wear it again, so I threw that bad boy in the wash by itself on a gentle cycle and let it air-dry and it was PERFECT. the fabric is hella cheap, so there are a few little imperfections from sitting on concrete/ catching it on something, I don't know, but it's not like I bought it expecting excellence so I don't care one bit. looking forward to finding excuses to wear this again!!
summary: I didn't know what left shark was until I was at a party wearing this costume
